111a6('bum): ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// yid kyi rnam par
111a7('bum): shes pa dngos po 'od ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// myig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi
111a8('bum): bsgom mo/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// myig gi 'dus te reg
111b1('bum): ba'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ 
111b2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po yodaces bya bar myi bsgom mo// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po yod
111b3('bum): ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// sa'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// chu'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// mye'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// rlung gi khams dngos po yod ces bya
111b4('bum): bar myi bsgom mo/ nam mkha'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// 
111b5('bum): ma rig pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// 'du byed dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces/ bya bar myi bsgom mo// mying dang gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom
111b6('bum): mo skye mched drug dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya ba ra myi bsgom mo// sred pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// len
111b7('bum): ba dngos po yid ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// srid pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// skye ba dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ rga shi dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// blang ba dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom
111b8('bum): mo/ dor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// bsam gtan dang po dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ bsam gtan gsum pa dngos po yod ces/ 
112a1('bum): bya bar myi bsgom mo// bsam gtan bzhi pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// byams pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ snying rje dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// dga' ba/ 
112a2('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ btang snyoms dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// rnam shes mtha'
112a3('bum): yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched
112a4('bum): kyi snyems par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// chos rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ dge 'dun rjes
112a5('bum): su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ tshul khrims rje/ sa su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ gtong ba rje/ sa su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ lha rjes su
112a6('bum): dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// skyo ba rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rje sa su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ 'chi ba rjes
112a7('bum): su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// myi rtag pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dngos
112a8('bum): po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// bdag myed pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ myi sdug pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ dngos po myed pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod
112b1('bum): ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// bdag gyi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// sems can gyi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// srog gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// 
112b2('bum): skye ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ gso ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ skyes bu'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ gang zag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces
112b3('bum): bya bar myi bsgom mo// shed can gyi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi ba sbom mo// shed bdag gyi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo byed pa po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// tshor
112b4('bum): ba be'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ shes pa po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ mthong ba po'i// 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// rtag pa'i 'a
112b5('bum): shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// badre ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// sdug pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom
112b6('bum): mo dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// dbang po rnas
112b7('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// stobs rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar/ 
112b8('bum): myi bsgom mo// mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// rnam par thard pa brgyad dngos po yod ces bya
113a1('bum): bar myi bsgom mo// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// rtog pa bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzinang dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ 
113a2('bum): rtog pa myed la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// rtog pa myed cing dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzinang dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos
113a3('bum): po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ kund 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// lam 'phags pa'i bden pa
113a4('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// sdug bsngal shes pa dang sa po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// kun 'byung ba shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ 'gog pa shes pa dngos po yod ces bya
113a5('bum): bar myi bsgom mo/ lam shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgo ma mo/ zad pa shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// rmyi skye ba shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ chos shes pa
113a6('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ kun rdzob shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ 'dris pa shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo
113a7('bum): sgra ji bzhin shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// bzod pa'i pha
113a8('bum): rol tu phyind pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ 
113b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// nang stong nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ phyi stong pa nyid dngos po myed ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// phyi ma stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya
113b2('bum): bar myi bsgom mo/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yid ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ chen po stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ 'dus byas so/ 
113b3('bum): pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
113b4('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos po/ 
113b5('bum): yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid da ngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dngos
113b6('bum): popo yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// mngon par shes pa drug dngos po yod ces bya bar
113b7('bum): myi bsgom mo/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom
113b8('bum): mo myi 'jigs pa bzhi dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom
114a1('bum): byams pa chen po dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// snying rje chen po dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ la nad cig phyir
114a2('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ dgra bcom pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ rang byang chub dngos po yod ces bya bar myi
114a3('bum): bsgom mo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs
114a4('bum): pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga dngos po'i 'du shes can la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la bsam gtan gyi pha rol
114a5('bum): tu phyind pa bsgom pa myed do/ dngos po'i 'du shes can la brtson 'gru/ sa kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa myed do/ dngos po'i 'du shes ca na la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa myed do/ dngos po'i 'du
114a6('bum): shes can la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed de/ dngos po'i 'du shes can
114a7('bum): la phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la chen po stong pa nyid bsgom
114a8('bum): ba myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed de/ dngos po'i 'du shes can la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// 
114b1('bum): dngos po'i 'du shes can la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom
114b2('bum): bamyed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom
114b3('bum): ba myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la myigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed
114b4('bum): do dngos po'i 'du shes can la dngos pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyi bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la mngon par she/ das pa drug bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la ting nge 'dzin
114b5('bum): thams cad bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la gzungs kyi sgo thams cad bsgom pa myed do/ dngos po'i 'du shes can la de bzhi na gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes
114b6('bum): can la myi 'jigs pa bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la
114b7('bum): byams pa chen po bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la snying rje chen po bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
114b8('bum): 'bras bu bsgom pa myed de/ dngos po'i 'du shes can la phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la rang byang chub bsgom pa myed do// 
115a1('bum): dngos po'i 'du shes can la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la bag chags kyi mtshams
115a2('bum): sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba myed do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dngos po la 'di ni bdag go zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags te/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam/ 
115a3('bum): gtan dang / shes rab dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / den ngom pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa/ 
115a4('bum): nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba byed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid sto/ na/ 
115a5('bum): pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid de / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad
115a6('bum): dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying
115a7('bum): chen po dang / rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
115a8('bum): pa nyid dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba la 'di ni bdag go zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags par gyur pas/ gang mtha' gnyis la chags pa de la ni tha rad pa myed do// de ci'i phyir/ 
115b1('bum): sto ngem tho'i du shes panas du spyod babyed/ num khrims kyang byed/ med pa pa byed/ na de 'grus kyang byed/ bsam btan yang rnyed/ shes pa kyang byed/ lam yang byed / shes kyang bye / 
115b2('bum): pa sung byed/ mngon par rtogs pa yang spyod/ mthun pa'i bzod pa yang byed// gzugs kyang yongs su shes pa byed/ tshor ba yang yongs su shes paskyed/ 'du shes kyang 'ongs su shes pa byed/ 'dubye
115b3('bum): yongs su shes parnyed/ rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa skyed/ rtsig kyang spongs su gas pa byed/ nub yang yongs sugs pa byed/ sA yang rings su shes pa byed/ bre yang yongs su thos pabyed/ sus kying sa
115b4('bum): su shes pa myed/ yid kyang yongs su shes pa myed// gzugs kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ sgra yang yongs su shes pa myed/ dri yang yongs su shes pa myed/ ro yang yongs su shes pa myed/ reg kyang yongs su shes pa myed
115b5('bum): chos kyang yongs su shes pa myed// myig gi rnam par shes pa yang yo/ dngas su shes pa myed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ 
115b6('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang yo ngas su shes pa myed// myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang yongs su
115b7('bum): shes pa myed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang yongs su shes
115b8('bum): ba myed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang yongs su shes pa myed// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang yongs su shes pa myed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang yongs su shes pa myed/ 
116a1('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang yongs su shes pa myed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang yongs su shes pa myed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang
116a2('bum): thamam su shes babyed/ mid kyi 'dus ga pa'i byed kyi tshor ba yang mongs su shes pagyid// nga'i 'alas kyang yongs su shes paskyed/ dul bas kyang 'ongs su shes paskyed/ byo thams kyang sa
116a3('bum): du shes pabyed/ rlung gi khams kyang yings sugs pa byed/ rnam ma 'a'i 'ams kyang yongs su shes pa byed/ rnam par shes nga'i bams kyang yongs su shes pa byed// nad cing 'breb bar 'byung ba yang so
116a4('bum): drushes pa byed/ ma rig pa yang songs su shes pa byed/ 'a byed kyang yongs su shes pabyed/ rnam par shes pa yang yongs su sa babyed/ mying dang gzugs kyang yongs su shes pa skyed
116a5('bum): skye mched drug kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ reg pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ tshor ba yang yongs su shes pa myed/ sred pa la/ nga yongs su shes pa myed/ lend pa yang yongs su shes pa myed
116a6('bum): srid pa yang yongs su shes pa byed/ skye ba yang yongs su shes pa myed/ rga shi yang yongs su shes pa myed/ blang ba yang yongs su shes pa myed/ dor ba yang yongs su shes pa myed/ bsam gtan dang
116a7('bum): po yang yongs su shes pa myed/ bsam gtan gnyis pa yongs su shes pa myed/ bsam gtan gsum pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ bsam gtan bzhi pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ byams pa yang
116a8('bum): yongs su shes pa myed/ snying rje yang yongs su shes pa myed/ dga' ba yang yongs su shes pa byed/ btang snyoms kyang yongs su shes pa byed/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yang
116b1('bum): yongs su shes pa myed/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ cung zad myed pa'i skyeman kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yang yongs su shes pa byed/ 'du shes byed
116b2('bum): 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yang yongs su shes pa myed// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ chos rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ dge 'dun rjes su
116b3('bum): dran pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yang yongasu shes pa myed/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ lha rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ skyo ba rjes su dran
116b4('bum): ba yang yongs su shes pa byed/ dbugs phyi nang du sgru ba rjes su dran pa yongs su shes pa myed/ 'chi ba rjes su dran pa yang yong sa su shes pa skyed/ lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa yang yongs
116b5('bum): su shes pa myed// myi rtag pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed / sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ bdag myed pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ myi sdug pa'i 'du shes kyang
116b6('bum): yongs su shes pa myed dngos po myed pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ bdag gi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ sems can gyi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ srog gi 'du shes kyang
116b7('bum): yongs su shes pa myed/ skyes bu'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ gsol ba'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ skyes bu'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ gang zag gi 'du shes kyang yongs
116b8('bum): su shes pa myed/ shed can gyi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ shed bdag gi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ byed pa po'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ tshor ba'i 'du shes kyang yongs
117a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu byiphyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rtog pa skyed cing dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sdug
117a2('bum): bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
117a3('bum): pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi/ 
117a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal shes da pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa sgom pa lags/ ji ltar na kun 'byung ba shes pa rnam par bsgom
117a5('bum): ba bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji lta ran 'gog pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lam shes pa rnam
117a6('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na zad pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na myi skye ba shes pa rnam par bsgom
117a7('bum): ba bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chos shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags// ji ltar na rjes su 'gro ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa
117a8('bum): bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na kun rdzob shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dris pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
117b1('bum): bi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sgra bzhin shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyind pa bskam pa bskam pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ 
117b2('bum): ji ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
117b3('bum): phyi nad pa blo sgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rnam par bsgom
117b4('bum): ba bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa bsgom pa she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na shes
117b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags// ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid da rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom
117b6('bum): ba lags/ ji ltar na phyi stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags
117b7('bum): ji ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom par bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chen po stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgom pa lags/ 
117b8('bum): ji ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags
118a1('bum): su shes pa myed/ shes pa po'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa byed/ mthong ba po'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ rtag pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ bde ba'i 'du shes kyang yongs
118a2('bum): su shes pa myed/ sdug pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ bdag gi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang yongs su
118a3('bum): shes pa myed/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ dbang po rnams kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ stobs rnams kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ 
118a4('bum): lam yang yongs su shes pa myed/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind kyang ngas su shes pa myed/ mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ 
118a5('bum): rnam par tha rad pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ mthar kyis gnas pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyang yongs su shes pa myed
118a6('bum): rtog pa myed la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ rtog pa myed cing dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ kun 'byung ba 'phags
118a7('bum): pa'i bden pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ lam 'phags pa'i bden pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ sdug bsngal shes pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ kun 'byung ba shes pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ 'gog pa shes pa yang yod
118a8('bum): su shes pa myed/ lam shes pa yang yongs su shes pa myed// zad shes pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ myi skye ba shes pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ chos shes pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ rjes su 'gro ba yang yongs su
118b1('bum): shes pa myed/ kun rdzob shes pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ 'dris pa shes pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ sgra ji bzhin shes pa yang yongs su shes pa myed// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ tshul khrims
118b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang
118b3('bum): yongs su shes pa myed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ nang stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa myed
118b4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ 'dus
118b5('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs
118b6('bum): su shes pa myed/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su
118b7('bum): shes pa myed/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ mngon par shes pa drug kyang yongs
118b8('bum): su shes pa myed/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyang yongs su shes pa byed/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang yongs su shes pa myed/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang
119a1('bum): yongs su shes pa byed/ se so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang yongs su shes pa myed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang yongs su shes pa skyed/ byams pa chen po yang yongs su shes pa myed
119a2('bum): snying rje chen po yang yongs su shes pa myed// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yongs su shes pa myed/ la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang yongs su shes pa myed// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang yong su she ba lde dgra btse ba'i kyang yong du sre bskyed/ 
119a3('bum): rang byang chub kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad
119a4('bum): spang ba yang yongs su shes pa myed na/ de tha rang par 'gyur ba lta ga las 'ong // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis shes bgyi ba ni ji legs/ dngos po ma mchis shes bgyi ba ji lags/ 
119a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de gnyis ni dngos po yod pa'o// myi gnyis pa ni dngos po myed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gnyis shes bgyi ba ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan
119a6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga gzugs kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// 'du byed kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni
119a7('bum): gnyis so// myig gi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rna ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// sna'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// lce'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// lus kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// yid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// gzugs/ 
119a8('bum): kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// smra'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// dri'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// ro'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// reg gi 'du shes ni gnyis so// chos kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'bru
119b1('bum): shes ni gnyis so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis
119b2('bum): so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// rna ba'i 'dus pa te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// lce'i 'dus te
119b3('bum): reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// rna ba'i 'dus te
119b4('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// sna'i 'dus te re ga pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// lce'i 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// lus kyi 'dus
119b5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// sa'i kha mas kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// chu'i khams kyi 'du shes ni gnyis
119b6('bum): song mye'i khams kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rlung gyi khams kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rtend cing 'brel bar 'byu
119b7('bum): ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// ma rig pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// 'du byed kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// mying dang gzugs kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// skye mched drug gi 'du shes
119b8('bum): ni gnyis so// reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// sred pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// lend pa'i 'du shes gnyis so// srid pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// skye ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis
120a1('bum): so rga shi'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// blang ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// dor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// bsam gtan dang po'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// bsam gtan gnyis pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis
120a2('bum): so/ bsam gtan ta ni gsum pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// bsam gtan bzhi pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// byams pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// snying rje'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/ dga' ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// 
120a3('bum): btang snyoms kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// cung zad myed
120a4('bum): pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// 'du shes myed 'du shes myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes na
120a5('bum): gnyis so// chos rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// gtong ba rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes
120a6('bum): ni gnyis so// lha rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// skyo ba rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// dbugs phyi nang du rgyu rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// 'chi ba rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/ 
120a7('bum): lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// myi rtag pa'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// bdag myed pa'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/ 
120a8('bum): myi sdug pa'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/ dngos po myed pa'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// bdag gi 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// sems can gyi 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// 
120b1('bum): srog gi 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// skye ba'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// gso ba'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// skyes bu'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// gang zag gi 'du shes kyi 'du shes
120b2('bum): ni gnyis so// shed can gyi 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// nga rag gi 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// byed pa po'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// tshor ba po'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// shes pa po'i 'du
120b3('bum): shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// mthong ba po'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rtag pa'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// bde ba'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// sdug pa'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis
120b4('bum): so bdag gi 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// dran pa nye bar ga zhag pa'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// yang dag par spong ba 'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i 'du shes kyi
120b5('bum): 'du shes ni gnyis so// dbang po'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// stobs kyi 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// byang chub kyi yan lag gyi 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// lam gyi 'du shes kyi 'a shes
120b6('bum): ni gnyis so// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rnam par tha rad pa'i 'du shes
120b7('bum): ni gnyis so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa babs pi ting nge 'dzind kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rtog pa myed la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzind kyi 'du shes
120b8('bum): ni gnyis so// rtog pa myed cing dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// kun 'byung ba 'phags ba'i bden pa'i 'du shes ni/ 
121a1('bum): gnyis so// 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// sdug bsngal shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// kun 'byung ba shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis
121a2('bum): so 'gog pa shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// lam shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// zad pa shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// myi skye ba shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// chos shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// rjes su 'gro ba
121a3('bum): shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// kun rdzob shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// 'dris pa shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// sgra ji bzhin shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// 
121a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
121a5('bum): pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// phyi ste/ nga pa nyid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes
121a6('bum): ni gnyis so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// 'dus ma byas sto/ 
121a7('bum): pa nyid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rang bzhin stong pa
121a8('bum): nyid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
121b1('bum): kyi 'dus shes ni gnyis so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// mngon par shes pa drug gyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'du
121b2('bum): shes ni gnyis so// gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// myi 'jigs pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// so so yang dag par rig pa 'du shes ni gnyis so// 
121b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// byams pa chen po'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// snying rje chen po'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// rgya nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// land cig phyir 'ong
121b4('bum): ba'i 'bras bu 'du shes ni gnyis so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni ga sa so// dgra bcom pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// rang byang chub kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
121b5('bum): kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// dgra bcom pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// rang
121b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// 'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rab 'byor de ltar de snyed du 'du shes
121b7('bum): dang bcas pa thams cad dang / ji snyed du 'du shes byed pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis te/ jitsam du gnyis pa de tsam du dngos po'o// ji tsam du dngos po yod pa de tsam du 'khor ba'o// ji tsam du 'khor ba de tsam du sems
121b8('bum): can rnams skye ba dang rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dond pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su myi 'grol lo// 'du shes thams cad yid la
122a1('bum): myi byed pa ni gnyis su myed pa ste/ rab 'byorang rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar gnyis kyi 'du shes can la sbyin pa myed pa dang / gnyis kyi 'du shes can la tshul khrims myed pa dang / gnyis kyi 'du shes
122a2('bum): can la bzod pa myed pa dang / gnyis kyi 'du shes can la brtson 'grus myed pa dang / gnyis kyi 'du shes can la bsam gtan myed pa dang / gnyis kyi 'du shes can la lam myed pa dang / gnyis kyi 'du shes can la 'thob
122a3('bum): ba myed pa dang / gnyis kyi 'du shes can la mngon par rtogs pa myed par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gnyis kyi 'du shes can la ni chung ngu mthun pa'i bzod pa yang myed na/ gzugs yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la

127a8('bum): pa mngon tu bya bar 'du shes pa dang / lam du 'du shes pa dang / lam bsgom par 'du shes pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / bag chags mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i
127b1('bum): bar du mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni gnas myed do// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos/ 
127b2('bum): gang la yang dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am dngos po myed par 'du shes pa myed do// gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po myed par 'du shes pa myed pa de nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen
127b3('bum): po'i mthun pa'i bzod pa'o// gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang dngos po myed par 'du shes pa myed pa de nyid lam bsgom pa'o// gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po myed par 'du shes pa de nyid ni
127b4('bum): 'bras bu'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam ni dngos po myed pa ste/ mngon par rtogs pa yang dngos po myed pa'o// rab 'byor du de ltar na rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar
127b5('bum): chos thams cad ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig par bya'o// ga sol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad dang // sa po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar
127b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur te/ de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas chos thams cad la dbang sbyar ba'i yul la mnga'
127b7('bum): brnyes par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de 'di la nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyang po sa spyod cing / pha
127b8('bum): ro la tu phyind pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye ba
128a1('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa myed pa dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / 
128a2('bum): bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong zhing 'phags pa rnams kyis/ dran
128a3('bum): ba dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te/ gnas so// bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing snga ma'i yid bde ba dang / yid
128a4('bum): myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal yang myed pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas par gyur te/ 'on kyang ngas bsam gtan de dag dang
128a5('bum): bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag gi mtshan ma bzung ste/ bsam gtan// de dag gis bsnyems par ma gyur/ bsam gtan gyi ro myong bar ma rgyu rang bsam gtan du dmyigs par ma gyur te/ de ltar na ngas bsam
128a6('bum): gtan de dag rnam pa yongs su dag pa la mnyam par gzhag go// de ltar na ngas bsam gtan de dag rnam par smind par byas nas/ shes pa rnam ba tha dad pa mngon tu bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/ lha'i rna ba'i shes
128a7('bum): ba mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/ pha rol kyi sems shes pa mngon tu bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa mngon dur bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/ lha'i myig gi shes pa mngon
128a8('bum): tu bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/ 'ond kyang ngas mngon par shes pa mngon tu bya ba de dag la mtshan mar bzung ste/ mngon par shes pa de dag gyi shes par ma gyurapa/ ro myong bar ma gyur pa/ dmyigs par ma gyur te/ mngon
128b1('bum): pabar shes pa lnga po de dag nam mkha' lta bur yang dag par rjes su dran pas mnyam par gzhag ste/ de ltar ngas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs pa rgyas
128b2('bum): nas/ 'di ni sdug bsngal lo// 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i lam mo zhes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par 'gyur te/ de ltar na de bzhin
128b3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par gyur pa/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur pa/ byams pa chen po dang ldan par gyur da/ snying rje chen po dang ldan par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas
128b4('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan par gyur nas sems can rnam chos phung po gsum du lung bstand par gyur pa to// rab 'byor da kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco
128b5('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bsam gtan bzhi bskyed par gyur pa/ ji ltar dngos po ma// mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mngon par shes pa bskyed par gyur pa/ ji ltar
128b6('bum): dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskye da par gyur pa/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi myi 'jigs pa bzhi bskyed par gyur pa/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid so so yang
128b7('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed par gyur pa/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi byams pa chen po bskyed par gyurapa/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi snying rje chen po bskyed par gyurapa/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis tI
128b8('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshesangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bskyed par gyur pa/ sems can rnams kyang sems can ma mchis par ji ltar phung po gsum du lung bstand par gyur pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
129a1('bum): rab 'byor dgal te 'dod pa rnams dang / sdig to myi dge ba'i chos rnams la dngos po zhig yod de/ ngo bo nyid yod pa 'am/ gzhan gi dngos po zhig yod na ni rab 'byor dngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
129a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pa rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sdig to mya dge ba'i chos rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas/ bsam gtan bzhi nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par yang myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de 'di ltar
129a3('bum): 'dod pa rnams/ sdig to myi dge ba'i chos rnams la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid myed pa gzhan gyi dngos po myed pa ste/ gzhan du dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pas/ rab 'byor da de'i phyir nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
129a4('bum): pab spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben sdig to mya dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba tsam bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur
129a5('bum): to// rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs/ su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa myed// pa dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde
129a6('bum): babacan bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to// dga' ba las 'dod chags bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams
129a7('bum): kyis dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyad pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to// bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid
129a8('bum): bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang myed/ sdug bsngal yang myed pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur pa to// rab 'byor da gal te mngon par shes pa
129b1('bum): rnams la/ dngos po zhig yod de ngo bo nyid yod pa 'am gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor dngas kyang mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
129b2('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams la dngos po myed de/ ngo bo nyid myed pa gzhan gyi dngos po myed pa ste/ gzhan du na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas de'i
129b3('bum): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du thugs su chud de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
129b4('bum): par sangs rgyas so// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che// sa thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la bsam gtan bzhi
129b5('bum): dang / mngon par shes pa lngas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya nga chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya na/ bcom ldan 'das de ci 'i slad du chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la byang chub
129b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthard kyis spyod pa dang / mthard kyis slob pa dang / mthar kyis nan tan du bgyi ba dang / gang gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
129b7('bum): ba'i mthar kyis spyod pa dang / mtha rad kyis sleb pa dang / mthar kyis nan tan du bgyi ba mchis par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thog
129b8('bum): mar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba'i dgra bcom pa dag dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / land cig phyir 'ong ba dang / 
130a1('bum): rgyu nad tu zhugs pa las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas
130a2('bum): rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / land cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rgyunang
130a3('bum): tu zhugs pa rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'phags pa thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi ngo bo nyid chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi gnas tsam yang myed de zhes bya bar thos nas
130a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ ji ste sangs rgyas rnams kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ rang
130a5('bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ dgra bcom/ ba rnams kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ phyir myi 'ong ba rnams/ kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ land cig phyir 'ong ba rnams
130a6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams kyang dngos be myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/ gal te bla na myed pa yang dag par rje / gas pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang rung / 
130a7('bum): gang te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang rung ste/ chos thams cad ni dngos po myed pa yin gyis ji nas kyang / bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas te/ 
130a8('bum): sems can dngos po'i 'du shes la spyod pa thams cad/ dngos po myed pa la rab tu dgod par bya snyam ste/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla/ 
130b1('bum): ba'i phyir/ bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'jug ste/ mthar kyis spyod pa dang / mthard kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis nan tan du bya ba gang la bsrabs/ sngon gyi byang chub sems
130b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mthar kyis spyod pa dang / mthar kyis bslal la/ mthar kyis nan tan du
130b3('bum): rtsom mo// de thog mar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
130b4('bum): phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / pha rol tu phyinang pa drug la spyod do// de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spro da pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // pha rol tu phyin
130b5('bum): pa rab tu gzhog go// sbyind pa'i legs par brjod do// sa mas can gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gyi yang le gas pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod// de sbyin pa des
130b6('bum): bskyed pa chen po'i tshogs thob par 'gyur te skyon dang ser sna myed pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par bya sbyin pa yongs su gtong bar byed do// zas 'dod pa la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa la skom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa la ni ba'o
130b7('bum): ba gas 'dod pa la ni gos/ spos 'dod pa ni smos/ 'phreng ba 'dod pa la ni 'phreng ba/ byug pa 'dong pa la ni thug pa/ mal cha 'dod pa la ni mal ma/ gnas 'dod pa la ni gnas/ mar mye 'dod pa la ni mar bye/ no drungs
130b8('bum): mu tig dang bye dur+yan+to dang dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang gser dang yul 'dod pa rnams ni/ nor bu dang mu tig dang / dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang gser dang / rdul yongs su gtong ba nas myi 'i yo byad gang
131a1('bum): ci yang rung ba'i bar de dag la gtong ba'i bar du ste/ de sbyin pa de nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de lha'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do// myi'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do// 
131a2('bum): de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims de nyid kyis ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po rab tu thob par byed do// de sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzind de nyid kyis shes rab kyi phung po rab tu thob par byed do// de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang
131a3('bum): ting nge 'dzind dang shes rab de nyid kyis/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po rab tu thob par byed do// de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzind dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba des rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung
131a4('bum): po rab tu thob par byed do// de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzind dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam paragrol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i de nyid kyis/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
131a5('bum): kyi sa las 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jugago// byang chub sems dpa'i skyond myed par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs
131a6('bum): su sbyin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum
131a7('bum): la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas mtha rad kyis spyod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir
131a8('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod do// 
131b1('bum): gzhan yang rdul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nang ba la yang dag par skul lo// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod do// gzhan nul khrims kyi pha rolang du phyinang pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod pa/ 
131b2('bum): mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de nul khrims des lnga'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed de/ myi che ba nyid rab tu thong bar byed do// de ner myed pa'i sems cad rnams la nor byi
131b3('bum): zhing / tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'gong ngo // shes rab la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do// de tshul khrims kyi phung ba
131b4('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ tshul khrims
131b5('bum): kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzi nad kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po da // rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug
131b6('bum): go byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// 
131b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum lo so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do// rab 'byor de/ 
131b8('bum): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de tshul khrims kyis mthar da kyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed do// rab 'byor
132a1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa la
132a2('bum): yang dag par sprul lo/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod do// gzhan bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang
132a3('bum): ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams sbyi pas yongs su tshim par byed do// rdul khrims la rab tu 'god de/ ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do// shes rab la rab tu 'ged do// rnam par grol ba rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol
132a4('bum): ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do// de tshul khrims kyi phung bo dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong
132a5('bum): pa'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang / shes ra ba kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol
132a6('bum): ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin
132a7('bum): par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su 'grol bar byed do/ 
132a8('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rjen po bzod pas mthar kyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed do// rab 'byor
132b1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul lo// brtson
132b2('bum): 'grus kyi legs pa brjod do// gzhan brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing sems can rnams sbyind pas yongs
132b3('bum): su tshim par byed do// tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzind la rab tu 'god do// shes rab la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do// 
132b4('bum): de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba 'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas sa las
132b5('bum): 'das nas tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i
132b6('bum): skyon myed par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smind par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob
132b7('bum): par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed de/ 
132b8('bum): rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed do// rab
133a1('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa ras nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang mang byed pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
133a2('bum): mnyam par gzhog go// gzhan yang tshad myed pa dang / bsam gtan dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la rab tu 'god do// tshad myed pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
133a3('bum): kyi legs pa brjod do// gzhan tshad myed pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhag pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// tshad myed pa dang / bsam
133a4('bum): gtan dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la gnas shing sems can rnams spyind pas yongs su tshim par byed// tshul khrim das la rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzin la rab tu dgod do// shes rab tu 'go
133a5('bum): do// rnam par grol ba rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma thong ba la rab tu 'god do// de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin da kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / 
133a6('bum): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i
133a7('bum): phung po de nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyond myed par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams
133a8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing / 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar
133b1('bum): byed de/ rab 'byer de ltar nabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtad kyis mthar kyis spyod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmyigs su byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la de bo nyid byed do// 'byor
133b2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do// tshul khrims la
133b3('bum): rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzind la rab tu 'god do// shes rab la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
133b4('bum): bdag kyang sbyind pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sgrub bo// brtson 'grus chom mo/ bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag go// shes rab sbos mo// gzhan yang sbyin pa la rab tu gzhog go// rdul
133b5('bum): khrims la rab tu gzhog go/ bzod pa la rab tu gzhog go// brtson 'grus la rab tu gzhog go// ting nge 'dzind la rab tu gzhog go// she sa rab la rab tu gzhog go// sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod do// tshul khrims
133b6('bum): kyi legs pa brjod do// bzod pa'i legs pa brjod do// brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod do// bsam gtan gyi legs pa brjod do// shes rab kyi legs pa brjod do// gzhan sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / tshul khrims srung ba
133b7('bum): dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa dang / shes rab bsgom pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul
133b8('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de dang / thabs mkhas pas nyam
134a1('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas dang / sems
134a2('bum): can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg
134a3('bum): ba gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mthar kyis spyod pa rtsom ste/ de thams cad kyang dmyigs su myed de
134a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya ba// bam po brgyad pa'o// / 
134a5('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ po mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis
134a6('bum): 'jug pa la slob ste/ de sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid rtog par byed de/ de sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom
134a7('bum): mo/ chos rjes su dran pa bsgom mo/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa bsgom mo// tshul khrims rjes su dran pa bsgom mo/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa bsgom mo/ lha rjes su dran pa sbom mo// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
134a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin te/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs su yid la myi
134b1('bum): byed/ tshor bar yid la myi byed/ 'du shes su yid la myi byed do// 'du byed du yid la myi byed/ rnam par shes par yid la myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs la ngo bo nyid myed do/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa den
134b2('bum): 'anges po skyed pa'i/ tshor ba la nge ba nyid myed de/ gang ma tshe bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po byed pa'o// 'du shes la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid byed pa de ni dngos pa byed pa'o// 'du byed la de bo nyid myed de/ gang 'dren
134b3('bum): nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid byed de/ gang la de bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po byed pa'o// dngos po byed bas ni dingos po myed pa dran par myi rus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa myed cing yid la
134b4('bum): bya ba myed pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
134b5('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis yid la mi byed/ sku gser gyi kha dog gis yid la myi byed/ 'od 'dom gang bas yid la myi byed/ dper byad bzang po brgyad cus yid la myi byed de/ 
134b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// sku gser gyi kha dog la ngo bo nyid myed de gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// 
134b7('bum): 'od 'dom gang ma ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cul ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa dran par
134b8('bum): kyi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba byed pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran ba sgom sa/ de bzhin gshegs
135a1('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshul khrims kyi phung por yid la myi byed/ ting nge 'dzind kyi phung por myi byed/ shes rab kyi phung por myi byed/ rnam par grol ba'i phung por yid la myi byed/ 
135a2('bum): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung por yid la myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po la ngo bo nyid
135a3('bum): myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// shes rab kyi phung po la ngo bo nyid myed de gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i phung po la ngo bo nyid myed de gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po
135a4('bum): myed pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o dang ni byed pas ni dngos po myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa myed cing yid
135a5('bum): la bya ba myed pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor dag zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dra na bsgom na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ 
135a6('bum): sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yid lta byed de/ myi 'jigs pa bzhis yid la myi byed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yid la myi byed/ byams pa chen pos yid la myi byed/ snying rje chen pos yid la myi byed
135a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis yid la myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o// myi 'jigs
135a8('bum): ba bzhi la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bani la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid byed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o// byams pa chen po la ngo bo nyid mye
135b1('bum): de gang ma ngo bo nyid byed pa de dag ni dngos po byed pa'o// snying rje chen po la ngo bo nyid byed de/ gang la ngobo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po byed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brdo brgyad la ngo bo nyid byed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid byed/ 
135b2('bum): pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
135b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtend cing 'bre lang cus yid la myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rtend cing 'brel
135b4('bum): par 'byung ba la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos dpe myed pa'o// dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa dran par myi nus te de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni sangs rgyas rjes
135b5('bum): su dran pa'o// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa
135b6('bum): bya'o// de ltar na mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthard kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ de mthar kyis spyod pa la slob cing / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthard kyis 'jug pa'i lam la
135b7('bum): slob pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos
135b8('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed
136a1('bum): pa'i ngabacad kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi ba romang du byin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po byed pa'i nga bo nyid kyi rdul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed doni
136a2('bum): dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos pa byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyir
136a3('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
136a4('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzog sa par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
136a5('bum): kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
136a6('bum): gyis theg ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin ste/ 
136a7('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
136a8('bum): par byed do// dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos pa byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po byed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos
136b1('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
136b2('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
136b3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs pa
136b4('bum): byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan la ga rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo za da kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs
136b5('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
136b6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ri bo nyid kyi nul gyis cad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos pa byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs byed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos pa myed pa'i
136b7('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par tharang ba brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i dzim
136b8('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
137a1('bum): smod pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzinang yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ dngos po myed pa ring po nyid kyi chub gyis te
137a2('bum): nge 'dzinang rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs/ 
137a3('bum): chu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdutshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa'i yongs su rdzogs par byed
137a4('bum): de dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos pa byed pa'i dri sa nyid kyi rdul gyis snyi rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo na nyid kyi
137a5('bum): rdul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rje gas par byed de/ dngos po myed pa'i de bo nyid kyi nul gyis thams dashes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po skyed pa'i ritho ma
137a6('bum): kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo/ 
137a7('bum): nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de ltar ngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/ dngos po myed par 'du shes pa yang myed na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos// rab
137a8('bum): 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes
137b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas chos rjes su dran pa bsgom na/ dge ba'i chos yid
137b2('bum): lamyi byed/ myi dge ba'i chos yid la myi byed/ 'jig rtend pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ zang zing dang bcas pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ zang zing myed pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ 
137b3('bum): 'phags pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ zag pa myed pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ 'dod pa'i khams su rtogs pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ 
137b4('bum): gzugs kyi khams su rtogs pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ gzugs myed pa'i khams su rtogs pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ 'dus byas kyi chos yid la myi byed/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos yid la myi byed do// 
137b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos de dag la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran
137b6('bum): ba myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni chos rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas chos rjes su
137b7('bum): dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor nga ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
137b8('bum): dpa' chen po mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos
138a1('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa yongs su rdzogs par
138a2('bum): byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par
138a3('bum): byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i nga ba nyid kyi tshul gyis
138a4('bum): phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
138a5('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyi sa don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
138a6('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
