138a7('bum): mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba myed
138a8('bum): pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su
138b1('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi nul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi nul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed/ 
138b2('bum): nga'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed
138b3('bum): ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su
138b4('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul/ gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos
138b5('bum): po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi nul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs pa bye do// dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnam sa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
138b6('bum): gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan
138b7('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs
138b8('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed
139a1('bum): de dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed
139a2('bum): do dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smond pa myed pa'i ting yin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
139a3('bum): gyis ting nge 'dzind rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
139a4('bum): bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su
139a5('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nya/ da kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
139a6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyi/ sa thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po/ 
139a7('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo tshad
139a8('bum): de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/ dngos po myed par 'du shes pa yang myed na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa
139b1('bum): 'am dran pa dang bral bar gyur pa lta ci smos/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa/ 
139b2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa bsgom ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun tshul khrims dang / 
139b3('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phun sum tshogs pa'i skyes bu zung bzhi dang / skyes bu gang zag brgyad po de dag dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed do// 
139b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid myed de gang la ngo nyid myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran
139b5('bum): ba myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'phye rang de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
139b6('bum): la spyod pas dge 'dun rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis 'jug pa'i/ 
139b7('bum): lamo yod pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthard kyis spyad pa la slob cing mthard kyis bslab pa dang / mthar da kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i/ 
139b8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol
140a1('bum): tu phyi nang pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam
140a2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myeng ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid
140a3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myang ba'i
140a4('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don
140a5('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya/ da do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa
140a6('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs/ 
140a7('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myeng ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos / 
140a8('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
140b1('bum): kyi tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
140b2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos pa byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa nga bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs
140b3('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
140b4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su rdzo/ gas par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs na mas yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi/ 
140b5('bum): tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag pabargyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi/ 
140b6('bum): tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad myed pa rnams yongs
140b7('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo na nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par thard pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs lnga
140b8('bum): byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs
141a1('bum): par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzinang yongs su rdzogs
141a2('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzind rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo/ 
141a3('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'jigs
141a4('bum): pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs
141a5('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs
141a6('bum): bar byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed dri/ 
141a7('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshu kyis mngon pa rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes
141a8('bum): pa 'am dngos po myed par 'du shes pa myed na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci smo sa// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims
141b1('bum): rjes su dran pa bsgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
141b2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom zhing / ma ral ba ma zhig pa/ ma 'dres skyon myed pa ma nyams pa mthu dang ldan pa
141b3('bum): mkhas pas sngags pa shinang tu rdzogs pa/ ting nge 'dzin yongs su bsgrubs pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa yin te/ de tshul khrims de dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la/ 
141b4('bum): ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni tshul khrims
141b5('bum): rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' nyen po chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa bsgom
141b6('bum): par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar kyis spyod pa yong ba yin te/ mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin bya/ mthar kyis slob po 'i lam yod pa yin te/ byang chub sems
141b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthard kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs
141b8('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par
142a1('bum): byed do dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
142a2('bum): kha yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
142a3('bum): byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
142a4('bum): gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzo gas par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
142a5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po mye da pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzog sa par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus
142a6('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed
142a7('bum): pastong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su
142a8('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed
142b1('bum): do dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed kyi
142b2('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngobo
142b3('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
142b4('bum): gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngo sa po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su rdzo gas par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
142b5('bum): stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzog sa par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags
142b6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams
142b7('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su
142b8('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par tha rang pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su
143a1('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs
143a2('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
143a3('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzinang rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo na rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
143a4('bum): tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa rnam sa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
143a5('bum): gyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po
143a6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
143a7('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de ni chos
143a8('bum): thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am dngos po myed par 'du shes pa yang myed na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/ 
143b1('bum): dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos// rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba rjes su dran par 'gyur ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems
143b2('bum): dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas/ gtong ba rjes
143b3('bum): su dran po sgom zhing gang zang zing gtong ba dang chos gtong ba mid la myi byed do// de yan lag dang nyin lag kyang yongs su gtong na/ dngos po gzhan la ji nig sa/ de ltar sbyid pa yongs su gtong yang 'di ltar bdag ni spyor
143b4('bum): yongs su gtong ste/ 'di ltar btang bar bya'o snyam du myi sems so// tra/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed ba'o// dngos po myed pas ni dngos rgya
143b5('bum): btud par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa myed ci nga yid la bya ba myed pa gtong ba rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor de/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams
143b6('bum): cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas gtong ba rjes su dran pa sgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar kyis spyad pa yod pa/ 
143b7('bum): yin/ mthar kyis bslab bkod gan/ mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug
143b8('bum): ba'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su
144a1('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'idi bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i di bo nyid kyi rdul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
144a2('bum): phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
144a3('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
144a4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yo/ ngas su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed
144a5('bum): papa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa ste/ nga pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
144a6('bum): kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las
144a7('bum): 'das pa stong pa'i nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo'i kyi chu gyi thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
144a8('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ris tham ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos
144b1('bum): mibyed pa nga ba nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gimacan nyid stong panyid 'angs su rdzogs par byed do/ ngos po myed bar dag nyid kyi rdul gyim kyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ngos 'i byed pa'i rjethon
144b2('bum): kyi rdul gyis dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i dri bo nyid kyi rdul gyis dngos po
144b3('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par
144b4('bum): spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i nga bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs
144b5('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa 'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs
144b6('bum): bar byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed
144b7('bum): ngo dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ngos pa byed dri ma'i kyi chu kyis gdug sngo rtsom
144b8('bum): 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngom pa byed pa'i ri bo nyid kyi nul gyis rnam par b.rad pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ngos pa byed pa'i ji nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar kyis gnas par sgoms
145a1('bum): par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzidzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i de bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma myed
145a2('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzinang yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smon pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su
145a3('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul gyis ting nge 'dzinang rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa ring bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po byed pa'i gyi
145a4('bum): nyid kyi rdul gyis dri bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzog sa par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'dzin/ bas pa bani yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
145a5('bum): tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed ngo// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul gyis snying rje
145a6('bum): chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
145a7('bum): bar byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de ni chos
145a8('bum): thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am/ dngos po myed par 'du shes pa yang myed na/ dran pa'i rdul tsam yang 'ong ba 'am/ dran pa
145b1('bum): dang bral bar 'gyur ba la ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga rjes su dran pa bsgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dil byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po
145b2('bum): bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas na lha rjes su dran pa sgom
145b3('bum): ste/ rgyal chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba dang / mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba dang / dga' ldan gyi lha skye ba dang / 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha skye ba'i lha dag dang / 
145b4('bum): gzugs na spyod pa dang / gzugs myed pa na spyod pa'i phyir myi 'ong ba de ngag dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yid la byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed
145b5('bum): pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa dri na bar myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni lha rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub
145b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas lha rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar
145b7('bum): kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthard kyis spyad pa la slob cing / mtha rad kyis bslab pa dang / mthar
145b8('bum): kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
146a1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
146a2('bum): tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
146a3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed bI/ 
146a4('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen
146a5('bum): po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyi/ da kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid
146a6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dnges po skyed pa ring bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'ongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos pa skyed pa'i nga bo nyid kyi nul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
146a7('bum): par byed do// dngos pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma tha ma myed pa'i stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed kyis / 
146a8('bum): na / stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yodas
146b1('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos pa skyed pa'i rab nyid kyi dul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos pa skyed pa'i nga ba nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos pa myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngom ma
146b2('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
146b3('bum): tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul
146b4('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngon nyid kyi rdul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// / ngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su
146b5('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi hUM la gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya sa yongs su rdzogs par
146b6('bum): byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed/ 
146b7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i
146b8('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par 'tha rad pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i rtsa/ 
147a1('bum): po nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyiting pe rin po su ga par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
147a2('bum): smonod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzinang yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzind rnams
147a3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs
147a4('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed
147a5('bum): do dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyi sa snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
147a6('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
147a7('bum): gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
147a8('bum): kyi tshul gyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am dngos po myed par 'du shes pa yang myed na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta
147b1('bum): mi nog spos/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mtharab
147b2('bum): kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ dngos po myong ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol
147b3('bum): tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o/ 
147b4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyi ches brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par
147b5('bum): bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i
147b6('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myeng ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul gyis stong pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos
147b7('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la/ 
147b8('bum): bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
148a1('bum): natshul gyis thog sa tha ma byed pa stong pa nyid la bslab par byo'o// dngos po myed pa'i de bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor babyed pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin
148a2('bum): stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po
148a3('bum): byed pang po nyid kyi nus gyis myi dmyigs pa stong ba nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i den nyid kyi rdul gyis dngos po skyed pa song panyid la bslab par bya'o/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul gyis ngo 'inying stong pa nyid
148a4('bum): la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslang ste
148a5('bum): bya'o/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnam sa la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phru la gyi rkang pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
148a6('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po
148a7('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam
148a8('bum): gtan rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad myed pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// 
148b1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul gyis rnam par tharang pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngon
148b2('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzinang rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis spyod pa skyed pa'i
148b3('bum): ting nge 'dzin la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin snre la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
148b4('bum): gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslab par bya'o// dngo sa po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa bzhi la bslab
148b5('bum): par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag pa/ ra rig pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul/ gyis byams pa chen po la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo
148b6('bum): po nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa ring bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la bas ba bar bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad
148b7('bum): shes pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myong ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// 
148b8('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la slob pa'i mthar kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis slab pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam
149a1('bum): yod pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin
149a2('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa
149a3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs
149a4('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed
149a5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rje/ gas par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid
149a6('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos
149a7('bum): pi myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha'
149a8('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thegs dang tha ma byed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi nul gyis dor 'byed pa spong bci
149b1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
149b2('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
149b3('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis su smras shing stong pa nyid yongs
149b4('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed/ pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su
149b5('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul da gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i rdza bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
149b6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
149b7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan
149b8('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i nga bo thod kyi tshul gyis tshang myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po byed pa'i ngobo nyid kyi rdul gyis gzugs byed pa'i sgoms par 'jug pa rnams yong
150a1('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i nga na nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par tharang pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul gyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i spobs
150a2('bum): bar 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin
150a3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smon par myed pa'i ting nge 'dzinang yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams
150a4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po skyed pa'i ba nyid kyi / kyis ting nge 'and rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ngos po kyi dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul kyis gzungs kyi sgonams yongs su rdzog
150a5('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa 'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par
150a6('bum): byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa
150a7('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi nul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul gyis
150a8('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyer
150b1('bum): banyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// don chos thams cad dngos pa byed pa'i di bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yong pa'ang myed na/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba ma/ 
150b2('bum): 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am// myig gam/ rna ba 'am/ sna 'am/ lce'am/ lus sam/ yid dam// gzugs sam/ sgra 'am/ dri'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam// myig gi
150b3('bum): rnam par shes pa 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am// myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ 
150b4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i
150b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg da pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'am/ ming kyi
150b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am// sa'i khams sam chu'i khams sam/ mye'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam ma kha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa
150b7('bum): 'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ mying dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa 'am/ tshor ba 'am/ sred pa 'am/ lenang pa 'am/ srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga shi 'am// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
150b8('bum): phyind pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
151a1('bum): pa 'am// nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong
151a2('bum): ba nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ 
151a3('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi/ 
151a4('bum): rkang ba rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya dad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams
151a5('bum): sam chad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs pa'i myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par tha rang pa'i
151a6('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma byed pa dang / smon pa byed pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams san
151a7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'am/ thams cad shes pa nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
151a8('bum): yod par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes yod par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de ni gnas myed pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa sa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di sang
151b1('bum): ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/ 'on ni gzugs kyang ma mchis/ tshor ba yang ma mchis/ 'du shes kyang ma mchis/ 'du byed kyang ma mchis
151b2('bum): rnam par shes pa yang ma mchis/ khams kyang ma mchis/ bye ma med kyang ma mchis/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang ma mchis/ rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams kyang ma mchis/ pha rol tu phyind pa rnaMs
151b3('bum): kyang ma mchis/ stong pa nyid thams cad kyang ma mchis// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang ma mchis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ dbang po rjes kyi ma mchis/ 
151b4('bum): stobs rnams ma mchis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang ma ma/ chis/ lam yang ma mchis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ bsam gtan rnams kyang ma mchis/ tshad myed pa rnams
151b5('bum): kyang ma mchis/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi nga ma mchis/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ rnam par
151b6('bum): thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa yang ma mchis/ mngon par shes rnams kyang ma mchis/ ting nge 'dzind rnams gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang ma mchis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
151b7('bum): kyang ma mchis/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ byams pa chen po yang ma mchis/ snying rje chen po yang ma mchis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ma mchis
151b8('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang ma mchis/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang ma mchis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang ma mchis/ sangs rgyas kyang ma mchis/ chos kyang ma mchis/ dge
152a1('bum): drang kya sa pachis/ mam sangs pa sa/ 'bras bu mngam mchis/ nyon mongs pa yang ma mchis/ rnam par byang ba yang sa mchis/ thob pa yang ma mchis/ mngon par rtogs pa 'ang ma mchis/ 
152a2('bum): thams cad kyang ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa'ang ba/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos thams cad dngos pa skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid la yod pa 'am/ skyeng pa zhig dmyigs su yong snyam 'am/ rab
152a3('bum): 'byor kyis gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la mchis pa 'am ma mchis pa myi dmyigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'on cim
152a4('bum): phyir khyod de ltar/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/ gzugs kyang myed/ tshor ba yang myed/ 'du shes kyang myed/ 'du byed kyang myed/ rnam par shes pa yang myed// myig kyang myed/ rna ba yang myed/ 
152a5('bum): sna yang myed/ lce'i yang myed/ lus kyang myed/ yid kyang myed/ gzu/ gas yang myed/ sgra yang myed/ dri yang myed/ ro yang myed/ reg kyang / myed/ chos kyang myed/ myig gi rnam par shes yang myed/ rna ba'i
152a6('bum): rnam par shes pa yang myed/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yang myed/ lce'i rna sa par shes pa yang myed/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang myed yid kyi rnam bar shes pa yang myed// myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang myed/ rna ba'i
152a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa yang byed/ sna'i 'dus te regs pa yang myed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang myed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang myed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang myed/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang myed/ 
152a8('bum): rnaba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang myed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang myed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang myed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang myed/ 
152b1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor yang myed// sa'i khams kyang myed/ chu'i khams kyang myed/ mye'i khams kyang myed/ rlung gi khams kyang myed/ nam mkha'i khams kyang byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang
152b2('bum): myed// ma rig pa yang myed/ 'du byed kyang myed/ rnam par shes pa yang myed/ mying dang gzugs kyang myed/ skye mched drug kyang myed/ reg pa yang myed/ tshor ba yang myed/ sred pa yang myed/ lend pa myed/ srid pa yang
152b3('bum): myed/ skye ba yang byed/ rga shi yang myed// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang ba yang myed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang myed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa yang myed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang myed/ 
152b4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang myed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang myed// nang stong pa nyid kyang myed/ stong pa nyid ma byed phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang myed/ stong pa nyid stong pa
152b5('bum): nyid kyang myed/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang myed/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang myed/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang myed/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang myed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang myed/ thog ma
152b6('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myed/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myed/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myed/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang myed/ rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang myed/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang myed/ 
152b7('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myed/ de bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang byed/ dngos yong cid stong pa nyid kyang byed/ dran banye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang byed/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang byed/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
152b8('bum): rnams kyang myed/ dbang po rnams kyang myed/ stobs rnams kyang myed/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang byed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang myed/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang byed
153a1('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyang myed/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang myed/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang myed/ rnam par tha rang pa rnams kyang myed/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
153a2('bum): kyang myed/ rnam par tha ra pa'i snying stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang myed/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang myed/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang myed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang myed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
153a3('bum): stobs rnams kyang myed/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang myed/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang myed/ byams pa chen po yang myed/ snying rje chen po yang myed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yang myed/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi
153a4('bum): ye shes kyang myed/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang myed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang myed/ sangs rgyas kyang myed/ chos kyang myed/ dge 'dun yang myed/ lam yang myed/ 'bras
153a5('bum): bu yang myed/ nyon mongs pa yang myed/ rnam par bya ba yang myed/ 'thob pa yang myed/ mngon par rtogs pa yang myed/ chos thams cad kyang myed do// zhes bya bar sems par 'gyur// rab 'byor kyis gsol
153a6('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos 'di dag la nem nur yang ma mchis/ the tsom yang ma mchis te 'o nad kyang bcom ldan 'das ma byung ba'i dus na/ dge slong nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ byang chub
153a7('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag 'di skad du gal te chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dngos po myed pa su zhig kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur zhes mchi zhing de dag kun
153a8('bum): nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba ma 'tshal pas/ tshul khrims log par 'gyur/ lha log par 'gyur/ spyod pa log par 'gyur/ 'tshe ba log par 'gyur te/ tshul khrims log par 'gyur ba dang / lta ba log
153b1('bum): 'das bdag gis ma byung ba'i chags pa de mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don de 'us pa lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni cis 'di la nes nung ram ze com pa mchis so// 
153b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa// rab 'byor da legs so legs so// de de bzhin te ji skang smras pa bzhin no// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa steng phrag brgya pa las/ le'u drug bcu rtsa gci/ 
153b3('bum): pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po dgu pa'o/ 
153b4('bum): tshe dang lda par 'byor kyi bcom ldan 'das sa yang 'di skad ces gso yadang/ bcom ldan 'das gas nyici sa bams ca dngos pos sa nga'ing ba nyid lags ra/ do ci gi mang cing byang du sangs
153b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don gyi slang du/ blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ji ltar chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin
153b6('bum): ba de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor dmyigs pa ni rgya chung ba ste/ dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can la theb pa myed do// mngon par rtog sa
153b7('bum): pa myed do// blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myed do// gsoyod pa/ bcom ldan 'das dmyigs pa ma mchis pa la thob pa'am mngon par rtogs pa'am bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchis sam/ 
154a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la rnam par 'khrug pa myed pa'i phyir myi dmyigs pa thob pa'o// myi dmyigs pa nyid mngon par rtogs pa'o// myi dmyigs
154a2('bum): pa nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo// gang myi dmyigs pa la thob pa 'am/ mngon par rtogs pa 'am/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la rnam par
154a3('bum): dkrug par 'dod du zad do// gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar dmyigs pa ma mchis pa la yang 'thob pa ma mchis/ mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma
154a4('bum): mchis la/ myi dmyigs pa nyid thob pa/ myi dmyigs pa nyid ma dngon par rtogs pa/ myi dmyigs pa nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzo/ gas pa'i byang chub lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
154a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa dang po yang ga la mchis/ sa gnyis pa yang ga la mchis/ sa gsum pa yang ga la mchis/ sa rba zhi ba yang ga la mchis/ sa lnga pa yang ga la mchis/ sa drug pa/ 
154a6('bum): yang ga la mchis/ sa bdun pa yang ga la mchis/ sa brgyad pa yang ga la mchis/ sa dgu pa yang ga la mchis/ sa bcu pa yang ga la mchis/ myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yang ga la mchis/ rnam par smin pa las
154a7('bum): byung ba'i mngon par shes pa yang ga la mchis/ rnam par smind pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa lha ga la mchis/ rnam par smind pa las byung ba'i tshul khrims kyang ga la mchis/ rnam par sminang pa las byung ba'i bzod pa
154a8('bum): yang gal mchis/ rnam par sbyind pa las byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyang gal mchis/ rnam par sbyind pa las byung ba'i bsam gtan yang ga la mchis/ rnam par spyod pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyang ga la mchis
154b1('bum): rnam par sbyinang pa las byung ba'i byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang ga la mchis/ rnam par spyod pa las byung ba'i chos de dag la gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi nang
154b2('bum): yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la zhal zas dang / btung ba dang / na bza' dang / gzims ca dang / pho brang dang / yo byad dang / me tog dang / gdug smos dang / spos dang / 'bre
154b3('bum): ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mar mye dang / lha dang myi'i phun sum tshogs pa gzhan gang yang rung ba dag gyis/ rim gro bgyid cing de la de dag rgyund kyi
154b4('bum): 'chad par yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bangar du sku gdung dang nyan thos dag la rnam par sma dpar gyur kyang bas par myi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i srang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ze chos kyi dbyes
154b5('bum): rnam par dkrug par bgyid par myi 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'dang sa kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor gang gyi phyir myi dmyigs pa de ni/ da kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings
154b6('bum): rnam par 'khrug par myigyi da/ de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa dang po'o// de nyid kyi phyir sa gnyis pa'o// de nyid kyi byings gsum pa'o// de nyid phyir sa bzhi pa'o// de cid kyi byings
154b7('bum): de nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa'o// de nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa'o// de nyid kyi phyiras brgyad pa'o// de nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa'o// de nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa'o// de nyid kyi phyir myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'o// de nyid kyi phyir rnam par smin pa
154b8('bum): las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa'o// de nyid kyi phyir rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa'o// de nyid kyi phyir rnam par smind pa las byung ba'i tshul khrims so// de nyid kyi phyir rnam par sbyind pa las byung ba'i bzod pa'o// nyi
155a1('bum): ga tu phyir rnam par skyind pa las byung ba'i brtson 'grus so// de cid kyi phyir rnam par spyod pa las byung ba'i bsam gtan no// de nyid kyi phyir rnam par smid pa las byung ba'i shes rab po / de cid kyi ci rnam par spong
155a2('bum): pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so// de nyid kyi phyir rnam par smind pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams yongs su smi nod
155a3('bum): par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yang zhal zas dang / btung ba dang / na bza' dang / rang gzims cha dang / pho brang dang yo byad dang / me tog dang gdug spos dang
155a4('bum): spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang chos gos dang / gdug sa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mar me dang / lha dang myi'i phun sum tshogs pa gzhan gang yang rung ba dag gyis rim gror byed cing de la/ 
155a5('bum): de dag rgyun myi 'chad par yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sku gdung dang / nyan thos dag la rnam par smind par gyur kyang zad par myi 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das myi dmyigs pa dang sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang / bzod
155a6('bum): pa dang brtson 'grus dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / shes rab mngon par shes pa rnams bye brag ni ci zhig mchis tha dad du bgyi ba ni ci zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da myi dmyigs pa dang / sbyin pa dang tshul
155a7('bum): khrims dang / bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / mngon par shes pa rnams lapa dang du bya ba gang yang byed do// rab 'byor dgos pa myed pa'i sbyinang par dang / gos pa byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / gos/ 
155a8('bum): babyed pa'i yod pa dang / shes pa byed pa'i 'artson 'grus dang / gos paskyed pa'i bsam gtan dang / gos pa byed pa'i shes rapa dang / gos pa byed pa'i mngon par shes pa dag pa nib dang du bya ba stod do// gsang ba
155b1('bum): ldan 'das gos pa ma mchis pa'i sbyi pa dang / gos pa ma mchis pa'i tshul khrims dang / gos pa ma mchis pa'i bzod pa dang / gos pa ma mchis pa'i brtson 'grus dang / gos pa ma mchis pa'i bsam gtad dang / zhes pas
155b2('bum): mdzes pa'i gas pa dang / gos pa ma mthis pa'i mngod par shes pa rnams nge sas dang du gyi bar ba dang / bcom lda 'das kyis pa 'bram dpa/ rang byong 'di byang chub sems dpa seb su dang 'dren pa shes
155b3('bum): rom tu phyi pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa myi dmyigs gtong ba myi dmyigs/ gtong ba po myi dmyigs/ lend pa myi dmyigs par sbyin pa gtong ngo // tshul khrims myi dmyigs par tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa phyi dbyigs pa'i/ 
155b4('bum): bzod pa sgrub po/ brtson 'grus myi dmyigs par brtson 'grus rtsom mo ting nge 'dzin myi dmyigs par ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go// shes rab kyi dmyigs par shes rab sgom mo/ mngon par shes pa myi dbyigs
155b5('bum): par mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod do// dran banye bar gzhag pa kyi dmyigs par dran ba nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams myi dmyigs par yang dag par spong ba rnams pa sred de/ 
155b6('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi dmyigs par rdzu 'phrul gyi nang ba rnams la spyod de/ yang po rnams phyi dmyigs par dbong po rnams la spyod da stongs rnams kyi dbyigs par stobs rnams pa spyod do// bya
155b7('bum): kyi yan lag rnams myi dmyigs par byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod do// lam myi dmyigs par lam la spyod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi dmyigs par 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod do// bsam gtan
155b8('bum): rnams myi dmyigs par bsam gtan rnams la spyod do// tshad byed pa rnams myi dmyigs par tshad myed pa rnams la spyod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dmyigs par gzugs myong ba'i snyoms par/ 
156a1('bum): 'jug pa rnams la spyod do// rnam par thar pa rnams myi dmyigs par rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dmyigs par mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
156a2('bum): par 'jug pa rnams la spyod do// stong pa nyid myi dmyigs par stong pa nyid la spyod do// mtshan ma myed pa myi dmyigs par mtshan ma myed pa la spyod do// smond pa myed par myi dmyigs par smond pa myed pa la spyod do// mngon par shes pa
156a3('bum): rnams myi dmyigs par mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod do// ting nge 'dzinang rnams myi dmyigs pa ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi dmyigs par gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
156a4('bum): rnams myi dmyigs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams myi dmyigs par myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi dmyigs par so so yang dag par
156a5('bum): rig pa rnams la spyod do// byams pa chen po myi dbyigs par byams pache na po la spyod do// snying rje chen po myi dmyigs par snying rje chen po la spyod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi dmyigs par sangs rgyas kyi chos
156a6('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod do// sems can rnams kyi dmyigs par sems can rnams yongs su sbyid par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi dmyigs par sangs rgyas kyi ning yongs su dag par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos myi dmyigs par/ 
156a7('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
156a8('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod na/ de la bdud sdig to can rnams sam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis tshugs par dka' ba yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da kyis bcom
156b1('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen the zhes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa la spyod par tshe/ ji ltar sems gcig gis pha ro la tu byidang pa drug yongs su 'dzin palags/ 
156b2('bum): bsam gtan pa ni yongs su ladzid pa lags par byed pa pa ni sengs su 'an pa lags/ gzugs byed pa'i sems par 'jug pa pani mongs su 'ad pa lags// darA bar gzhag pa pa'i yongs su ma zhing ba mad/ 
156b3('bum): yang dag par spong ba ba'i yongs su 'dzidzing b.lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su 'dzid pa lags// dbang po lnga yongs su 'dzid pa lags/ gangs lnga yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag 'dun yongs su
156b4('bum): 'drang ba lags// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yongs su 'dzin pal gas 'phags pa'i bden pa pani yongs su 'and pa lags/ rnam par
156b5('bum): thar pa brgyad yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ mthar kyis gnas pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su 'dzinang pa lags/ mngon par/ shes pa lnga yongs su 'dzin pa lags// nang stong pa nyid yongs su
156b6('bum): 'dzid pa lags/ dri stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ byin nga stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzidzid pa lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid longs su 'dzind pa lags/ chen po stong pa nyid yongs su la ning pa lags/ 
156b7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ 
156b8('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzind pa lags
157a1('bum): camarang gis ca nyid stong bcidang yongs su la zhing pa lags/ phyir phyogs pa song nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ ris pa skyed pa spong nyid 'ongs su la nid pa lags/ deb nyi stong nyid yongs su 'dzi
157a2('bum): ba lags/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ ting nge 'dzinang rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su 'dzinang pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su
157a3('bum): 'dzin pa lags/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ byams pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ snying rje chen po yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
157a4('bum): ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ myi chen po'i mtshan su ma bcu rtsa gnyis yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ dper byang bzang po brgya bcu yongs su 'dzinang pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang
157a5('bum): pa rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin ba gang gtong ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zin/ pa las gzhan du ma yin no// tshul khrims gang srung ba de shes rab kyi pha rol
157a6('bum): tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// bzod pa gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// brtson 'grus gang bsgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zinang / 
157a7('bum): pa las gzhan du ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// shes rab la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin/ 
157a8('bum): no bsam gtan rnams la gang snyoms par 'jug pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su banang ba las gzhan du ma yin no// tshad myed pa rnams la gang snyoms par 'jug pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zin pa
157b1('bum): las gzhan du ma yin no// gzugs byed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol
157b2('bum): tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab
157b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pasal dunas pag na du 'a // dbang po rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// stobs rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su
157b4('bum): zinang pa las gzhan du ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gang sgom bde shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi
157b5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// rnam pa ratha rad pa'i sgo rnams la gang bsgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sa yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
157b6('bum): la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// rnam par tha rad pa rnams bsgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// mthar kyis gnas pa'i spos
157b7('bum): par 'jug pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// 
157b8('bum): nang stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid
158a1('bum): la gang bsgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su zinang pa las gzhan du ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong ba nyid la gang bsgom pa de shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyinang pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma
158a2('bum): yin no chen po stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid la gang bsgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma
158a3('bum): yin nor 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gang sgom ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gang skom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zinang pa las gzhan/ 
158a4('bum): du ma yin no mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// thog ma dang da tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas/ 
158a5('bum): yongs su zin pa las gnan du ma yin no// dor ba skyed pa stong pa nyid la gas sdom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pas yongs su zin pa las ga zhan du ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gang skom pa de shes rab kyi pha
158a6('bum): rolang tu phyid pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no// nos thams cad stong pa nyid la gang skes pa de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pas yongs su banid pa las gzhan du ma yin no// rang gi macan nyid stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa
158a7('bum): de she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// dngos po myeng ba stong pa nyid la gang sgom
158a8('bum): ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zinang pa las gzhan du ma yin no// de bo nyid stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no// dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ 
158b1('bum): la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// ting nge 'dzind rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams
158b2('bum): la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pas stobs rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no// myi
158b3('bum): 'jigs pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma
158b4('bum): yin no byams pa chen po la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// snying rje chen po gang da sdom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yongs su zind pa las gzhan
158b5('bum): du ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du me yin no// mtshan pa rnams gang mngon par bsgrub pa de/ shes rab kyi pha
158b6('bum): rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// dpe byad bzang po rnams gang mngon par sgrub pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa las gzhan du ma yin no// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems
158b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod na// sems bskyed pa gcig gyis pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshad myed pa rnams yongs su
158b8('bum): rdzogs par byed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
159a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ 
159a2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rnam paras rang ba'i sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rnam par b.rang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs
159a3('bum): par byed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byi stong pa nyid yongs su
159a4('bum): rdzogs par byed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// chen po stong pa nyid yod sa su rdzogs par byed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
159a5('bum): par byed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong
159a6('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
159a7('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa/ 
159a8('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ting nge 'dzind rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// myi 'jigs
159b1('bum): ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa/ 
159b2('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dper byad bzang po brgya na yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
