244b4('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rtend kyis smang bar 'gyur te/ de la thog mar sems can thams cad kyi 'gon gyis shig ce 'am/ gnas dang / skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyis shig ces sus gsol ba gdab ces smad par 'gyur
244b5('bum): ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems da// pa' chen po'i drung du myir gyur pa 'am/ myi ma yin par gyur pa dag 'ongs nas bdag gi slongs mo pa'o zhes yan lag dang / nying lag bcad
244b6('bum): par gsol ba btab na/ de'i tshe des sbyin nas myi sbyin snyam pa'i sems gnyis su bskyed par myi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can rnams kyi don tu bsams
244b7('bum): te lus 'dis bdag gyis sems can thams cad kyi don tu bya'o zhes yongs su bzung bas na/ des 'di snyam du bdag gyis sems can 'di dag gyi don tu lus yongs su bzung bzung bas de dag slang myi dgos par khyer zhing deng shig ces sems
244b8('bum): bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos slongs mo pa mthong na/ 
245a1('bum): 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad ni ring bzhini dbyigs su byed na/ 'di la su nig ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong / su la ni spyod par bya mi zhig ni sbyin par bya/ zhes sems bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
245a2('bum): 'di ltar chos de dag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ste/ stong pa nyid la ni gang yang yongs su gtong ba 'am/ gang las kyang yongs su phrogs pa myed do// rab 'byor de des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
245a3('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa
245a4('bum): nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba byed pa stong pa te da dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ 
245a5('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ da // sa po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// de stong pa nyid
245a6('bum): de dag la gnas shing sbyin pa gtong na/ de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin da pa rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de sbyin pa 'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa des phyi dang nang gyi chos la bcad
245a7('bum): gangs kyang bdag la su yang 'grub pa'am/ gcad do snyam pa'i sems kyi 'byung ngo // / shes rab kyi pha rol tu byid du pa stong phrag brgyab// bam po bco lnga pa'o// 
245a8('bum): rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i
245b1('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du ma bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul/ 
245b2('bum): dang / yongs su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul dang / chotshe 'phrul gsum po de dag gis/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal du
245b3('bum): chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/ yongs su bstand pa'i tshe 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos snyand pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag snying rje 'a chen po dang / dga' ba chen po/ 
245b4('bum): dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des sems can dmyal ba 'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de
245b5('bum): dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen pode dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang / phyi dag dang skal ba mnya ma par skyes shing / rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar/ 
245b6('bum): 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor dngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lce phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi kham sa gang 'ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems/ 
245b7('bum): dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang yongs su bstand pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i
245b8('bum): cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la chos stond cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/ yongs su bstand pa'i/ 
246a1('bum): cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyi chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen pos chos stond te/ des sems
246a2('bum): can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs
246a3('bum): nas/ lha dang / myi dag dang / skal ba mnyam par skyes shing / rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rtend la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig
246a4('bum): rtend gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po da ga tu dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ 
246a5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul da / rjes su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul ba dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de drug/ gyis sems can dmyal ba ba'i sems can de dag la chos spyon cing / rdzu 'phrug

246a7('bum): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing / sems can

251a1('bum): kyi na du ma ga ma ba ba zhi sa da/ zung byed pa yang dag pa rtsegs

251a6('bum): chu myi gzon to// rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rtend la rnam par gzigs nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
251a7('bum): po dag byol song gyi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don tu bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang / nying lag bcad cing brngubs te phyogs bcur rnam
251b1('bum): par 'thor ba dang / byol song gyi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa thob pa
251b2('bum): dang / de dag byams pa thob pa des byol gyi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas/ lha dang / myi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas
251b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/ de bzhin du nan tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ 
251b4('bum): theg pa gsum po de dag gyis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byord de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na myed pa yang
251b5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o// rab 'byor dngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs
251b6('bum): na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gyi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don tu bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byed
251b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang / nying lag bcad cing gtubs te phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gyi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
251b8('bum): chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang / de dag byams pa thob pa des/ byol song gyi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas/ lce dang / 
252a1('bum): myi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan
252a2('bum): 'das de dag las chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gyis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
252a3('bum): su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan
252a4('bum): ba mang po byed pa'o// rab 'byor da ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rtend la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi kha mas gang 'ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
252a5('bum): dpa' chen po de dag byol song gyi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don tu bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang / nying lag bcad cing gtubs
252a6('bum): te phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gyi skye gnas su gtog sa pa'i sems can de dag gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
252a7('bum): la byams bathob pa dang / de dag byams pa thob pa des/ byol song kyi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas/ lha dang / phyi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mnyes par byed pa/ 
252a8('bum): dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
252b1('bum): pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gyis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan bu mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na
252b2('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang
252b3('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gyi skye gnas pa'i sems can gyi don tu bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
252b4('bum): dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang / nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/ phyog sa bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gyi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
252b5('bum): gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang / de dag byams pa thob pa des/ byol song / gyi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas/ lha dang / 
252b6('bum): myi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mnyes pa byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las
252b7('bum): chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs
252b8('bum): su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni phan pa mang po byed pa'o// 
253a1('bum): rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
253a2('bum): dpa' chen po dag byol song gyi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don tu bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang / nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba
253a3('bum): dang / byol song gyi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gyi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang / de dag byams
253a4('bum): pa thob pa des byol song gyi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas/ lha dang / myi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
253a5('bum): de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de dganyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen
253a6('bum): po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'a das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byar da ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'dzag rtend la rnam
253a7('bum): papar gzugs na/ shar lhar phyags 'tshams kya 'jag tand gyi khams gang 'ge'i klung rgyang klu rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing de bzhin
253a8('bum): nyid du nam tan byed pa de dag ni len pa mang po byed pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyadan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung kyi gyi
253b1('bum): ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gyi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don tu bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang nying lag
253b2('bum): bcad cing gtubs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gyi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa'/ 
253b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang / de dag byams pa thob des/ byol song gyi ske gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas/ lha dang myi nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
253b4('bum): 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad sa de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad/ sa de dag las chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de
253b5('bum): dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya/ ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
253b6('bum): ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o// 
253b7('bum): rab 'byor da ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
253b8('bum): byol song gyi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don tu bdag yongs su gtong bar byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang / nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor
254a1('bum): ba dang / byol song gyi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams
254a2('bum): ba thob pa dang / de dag byams pa thob pa des/ byol so gyi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas/ lha dang myi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / 
254a3('bum): de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos stond te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
254a4('bum): 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan la sa 'da' ba ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
254a5('bum): gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing nga / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o// rab 'byor da ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten
254a6('bum): la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gyi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don tu bdag yongs su gtong
254a7('bum): ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang / nying lag bcad cing gtugs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gyi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gyis byang chub
254a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gyi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang / de dag byams pa thob pa des/ byol song gyi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing rnam par
254b1('bum): langs nas/ lha dang / myi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
254b2('bum): de dag las chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gyis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su
254b3('bum): rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa de dag ni
254b4('bum): de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o// rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
254b5('bum): dpa' chen po dag byol song gyi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi// don tu bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems da/ pa'i sems dpa' chen po yan lag dang / nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/ 
254b6('bum): phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gyi skye gnas su gtog sa pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
254b7('bum): de dag la byams pa thob pa dang / de dag byams pa thob pa des/ byol song gyi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas/ lnga dang myi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par
254b8('bum): byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las zlos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ ra sangs rgyas kyi
255a1('bum): theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gyis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub
255a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni phan pa mang po byed pa'o// / 
255a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po bcu drug pa'o// / rab 'byor dngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig
255a4('bum): rten la rnam par gzigs na/ sharang phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul ba rnams kyi yi dgas kyi
255a5('bum): yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'dzi la zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag ni sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
255a6('bum): po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rtend dang myi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ 
255a7('bum): phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis
255a8('bum): 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang 'ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul ba rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal
255b1('bum): ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos stond pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / 
255b2('bum): yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rtend dang / myi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan
255b3('bum): las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ba mthong ngo // rab 'byor de ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs
255b4('bum): na nub phyogs kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed yod
255b5('bum): pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag ni sems can yi dgas kyi yul ba de dag byang chub sem// sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed
255b6('bum): cing yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yid gas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyi da kyis lha'i 'jig rtend dang / myi'i 'jig rtend du skyes te/ phung po
255b7('bum): ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor dngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig
255b8('bum): rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul ba rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal
256a1('bum): ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing / ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos stond pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed
256a2('bum): cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang zhing / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha dang / myi'i 'jig rtend du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
256a3('bum): dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar
256a4('bum): kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yidags kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji
256a5('bum): snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos stond pa dang de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul ba de dag byang chu/ ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / 
256a6('bum): yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lnga 'jig rten dang / myi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
256a7('bum): dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor de ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis 'jig rtend la rnam par gzigs na/ shar
256a8('bum): lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi rigs kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed yod pa de dag
256b1('bum): thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos stond pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas
256b2('bum): rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnams par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid lha'i 'jig rten dang / mya'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las
256b3('bum): 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten
256b4('bum): gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgangs kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad 'jil
256b5('bum): zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos stond pa dang / de dag sems can yid gas kyi yul ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ngag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas
256b6('bum): rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas/ rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / spyi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su
256b7('bum): mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs 'jams
256b8('bum): kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngan
257a1('bum): ji snyed yod pa de dag cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos stond pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / 
257a2('bum): yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rtend dang / myi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
257a3('bum): su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs
257a4('bum): kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed yod pa de dag
257a5('bum): thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos stond pa dang / de dag sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dgas kyi
257a6('bum): skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / myi'i 'jig rten du skyes nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su
257a7('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig
257a8('bum): rten gi khams gang 'ga'i klung kyi byem snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dwags kyi yul ba rnams kyi yi rigs kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jis zhing seras
257b1('bum): spang ba'i phyir chos stonang pa dang / de dag na sems can yi rigs kyi yul ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems kye cing / yi rigs kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi
257b2('bum): dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / myi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
257b3('bum): rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems
257b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris sa kyi lha rnams la chos stond pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos stond pa dang / byang
257b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las la/ nges par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs
257b6('bum): su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de lta bu'i lha'i bu ga nga 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal myed khang de da ga 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 
257b7('bum): 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag myed pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni myi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtand du myi rung ba/ 'du byed thams/ 
257b8('bum): cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor dngas yang 'di nas pa rgyas kyi byin gis 'jig rtend la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'dzin
258a1('bum): rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos stond pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / 
258a2('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos stond pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs
258a3('bum): su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal myed khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar
258a4('bum): gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag par 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag myed pa 'du byed thams cad ni myi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du
258a5('bum): myi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos stonang / ste to// rab 'byor dngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten
258a6('bum): la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang 'ag 'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag sa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos stod pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum
258a7('bum): dang mchem dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi stong bu dag go theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya
258a8('bum): ngan 'as 'das par gyud pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'dal ba dang / longs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba bathod ste/ rab 'byor de la lnga ba 'dod pa'i yon tan rdzas gas cher byes pa de dag la gnal byed 'ang ngan
258b1('bum): 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyurd par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ / 'du byed thams cad ni bdag/ 
258b2('bum): myed pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni myi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtanang du myi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos stonang to// 
258b3('bum): rab 'byor da ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gyi snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi/ 
258b4('bum): lha rnams la chos stond pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnam sa la chos stond pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
258b5('bum): po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong
258b6('bum): ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal myed khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag/ 
258b7('bum): ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag byed pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni myi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du kyi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 
258b8('bum): 'du byed rnams las su nagi yid thems par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor dngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi srun gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar gyi phyogs 'arnams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang 'an rje
259a1('bum): klung gyi bye snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos stond pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul
259a2('bum): dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos stond pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su
259a3('bum): mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal myed khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar
259a4('bum): gyur da par shes nas 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad myi rtag dpa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bad dag myed pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni myi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad
259a5('bum): ni yid brtan du myi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas she/ sa chos stond to// rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
259a6('bum): 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos stond pa dang / sum bcu
259a7('bum): rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis/ chos de thos nas/ theg pa
259a8('bum): gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lnga'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher bye
259b1('bum): pa de dag la gzhal byed khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyu ra par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag
259b2('bum): myed pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni myi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du myi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yod phebs par gnas shes chos stonod to// 
259b3('bum): rab 'byor da ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs kyi 'tshams kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
259b4('bum): chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos stond pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos stonang pa dang / byang chub
259b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos/ de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las/ 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs
259b6('bum): su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhan myed khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad
259b7('bum): du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag myed pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni myi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du myi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad/ 
259b8('bum): rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lha su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor da ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs
260a1('bum): 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang raga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos stond pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 
260a2('bum): 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos stond pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum po rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / 
260a3('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'dal bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la/ gzhal myed khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par bya
260a4('bum): shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag myed pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni myi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du myi rung ba/ 'du byed/ 
260a5('bum): thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes stond to// rab 'byor da ngas yang // 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 
260a6('bum): 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la tshe sa stond pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang
260a7('bum): 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos stond pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur da pa/ 
260a8('bum): dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal myed khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag
260b1('bum): skye bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag skyed pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni myi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan
260b2('bum): du myi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos stond to// rab 'byor dngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs
260b3('bum): nang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos stond pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 
260b4('bum): 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos stond pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las
260b5('bum): 'da' bar gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de la lha'i bu ga/ nga 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal myed khang de/ 
260b6('bum): ngag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ de skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ 'du byed tham sa cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag myed pa/ 'du byed thams
260b7('bum): cad ni myi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du myi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor da ngas yang 'di nas sangs
260b8('bum): rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rtend la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhend pa de dag la
261a1('bum): kye grogs pa dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bskyed chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces/ lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor nga de ltar byang chub
261a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byorang/ 
261a3('bum): ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba
261a4('bum): mngon par zhend pa de dag la kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ji zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la zhig lta ba skyed ces/ lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byed
261a5('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos stond to// rab 'byor da de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung
261a6('bum): ba'i chos so// rab 'byor dngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'ji garten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
261a7('bum): sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhend pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ji zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar
261a8('bum): byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
261b1('bum): rnams kyi mang du byu sos so// ra 'byo ngas ya 'das sa sargyas kyi spa kyis 'jig rten 'dam pa gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig nad kyi 'bas gang ragang krung sa kyim ze dgang / byang chu sem sa dpa sems dpa
261b2('bum): chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhend pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ji zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag
261b3('bum): dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mnar che te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher/ 
261b4('bum): bo rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor da ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang 'ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub
261b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang rangs pa'i / ba la mngon par zhend pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad/ stong pa la ji zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha sna/ 
261b6('bum): la ji zhig lta ba skyed lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar
261b7('bum): che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor da ras yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lce'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang 'ag
261b8('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhend pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gseg dang
262a1('bum): gso sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams
262a2('bum): la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor dngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho
262a3('bum): nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhend pa de dag la kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong
262a4('bum): pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
262a5('bum): snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos stond pa dang rab 'byor de de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas
262a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rtend la gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i
262a7('bum): lta ba la mngon par zhend pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor
262a8('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mang du byung ba'i/ 
262b1('bum): chos so// rab 'byor dngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
262b2('bum): po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhend pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ji zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag
262b3('bum): dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// / rab 'byor dngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gyi
262b4('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i dalta ba la mngon par zhend pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams
262b5('bum): cad stong pa la ci zhig lha skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob / stag la ji zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byedab mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
262b6('bum): chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos stond to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor dngas 'di nas/ 
262b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ sharang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag myi rnams/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdung ba
262b8('bum): mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig bstan pa dang / dor srung ba dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lo phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang / 
263a1('bum): 'ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag myi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang gA zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyand pa dang / don spyad pa dang / 
263a2('bum): don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag myi
263a3('bum): rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gdu sbyind pa dang / tshig snyand pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rtend la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig
263a4('bum): rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/ myi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyand pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o/ 
263a5('bum): rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis 'jig rten la rnam par ga/ zigs na/ byang sha rad kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams/ gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
263a6('bum): po dag myi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyand pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par
263a7('bum): gzigs/ shar lce'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag myi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig
263a8('bum): snyand pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang / 
263b1('bum): nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag myi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig bstan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig
263b2('bum): rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byad kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/ myi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin
263b3('bum): ba dang / tshig snyand pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub
263b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag myi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / de na sprad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan
263b5('bum): gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag myi rnams khaM sdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste
263b6('bum): bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyand pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bdun pa'o// 
263b7('bum): rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
263b8('bum): chen po sbyin pa gnyis kyis sems can rnams sdud de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa'o// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pas sems can rnams
264a1('bum): sdud pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gser ram/ dngul lam/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ bye dur+ya 'am/ rung ngam/ mni shel lam/ 
264a2('bum): byi ru 'am ngas le sbram 'am/ zas sam/ skom 'am/ gdugs sam/ gos sam/ spos sam/ 'phreng ba 'am/ byug pa 'am/ mal cha 'am/ bstan nam/ 'tsho ba 'am/ bud myed dam/ skyes pa 'am/ rta 'am/ glang po che 'am/ bdag
264a3('bum): yongs su gtong na/ 'di skad du kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ bdag nyid kyi dang 'dra bar bslang myi dgos par khyer cig/ long la deng shig ces brjod de/ sbyin pa des sbyin pa de byin nas/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su gtong ngo // chos la skyebs su
264a4('bum): gtong ngo // dge 'dun la skyabs su gtong ngo // la la ni bslab pa'i gnas lnga 'dzinang du 'dzud do// la la ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i nye bar gnas pa la nye bar gnas par byed do// la la ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi
264a5('bum): lam rnams la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan dang po la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan gsum pa la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la 'god do// la la ni byams pa
264a6('bum): la 'god do// la la ni snying rje la 'god do// la la ni dga' ba 'god do// la la ni btang snyoms la 'god do// la la ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do// la la ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do// la la ni cung zad myed pa'i
264a7('bum): skye mched la 'god do// la la ni 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la 'god do// la la ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni chos rjes su dran pa yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa yang
264a8('bum): dag par skul lo// la la ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni gtong ba rjes su dran pa la yang dag byar skul lo/ la la ni lha rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni lus myi gtsang ba las stsogs
264b1('bum): pa'i 'du shes su so sor brtags pa la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni rnam par dag pa la yang dag par sprul lo// la la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul lo/ la la ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi la
264b2('bum): dag par skul lo// la la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang dag par sprul lo// la la ni dbang po lnga la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni stobs lnga la yang dag par sbrul lo/ la la ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yang dag par skul lo// 
264b3('bum): la la ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed dmas khyodani ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par sprul lo// la la ni rnam par thard pa brgyad la yang dag par
264b4('bum): skul lo// la la ni mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang da ga par skul lo/ la la ni myi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo
264b5('bum): la la ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni/ byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
264b6('bum): bcwo brgyad la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni myo chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa ge nyis yongs su grub pa yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni dpe' byad bzang po brgya cu la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
264b7('bum): yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni dgra bcom pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni rang byang chub la
264b8('bum): yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po shes
265a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la zang zing gyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / thabs mkhas pas/ bla na myed pa'i bde ba dang ldan par 'god de/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems
265a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na
265a3('bum): rab 'byor de gnyis po 'di dag ni chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ 'jig rtend pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// rab 'byor de 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/ 'jig rtend pa'i chos rnams brjod pa dang / bshad pa dang / ma ne rang por bstan
265a4('bum): pa ste/ 'di ltar myi gtsang ba'i rnam par dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jurtag pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i chos
265a5('bum): byis pa so so'i skye bo dag dang thun mong du byas pa rnams te/ rab 'byord de ni 'jig rtend pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'jig rtend kyi chos kyi sbyin pa de btang
265a6('bum): nas rnam grangs du mas 'jig rten gyi chos ma nor bar blangs pa de las bskyod de/ de las bskyod nas thabs mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu dag la rab tu 'god de/ de la 'phags pa'i chos
265a7('bum): rnams ni gang 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / 
265a8('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa rnams so// 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni rgyund tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
265b1('bum): bu dang la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid de// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos ni/ rgyu na tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// land cig
265b2('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid shes pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa shes pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa shes pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa shes
265b3('bum): pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa shes pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa shes pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa shes pa'o// nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid shes pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid
265b4('bum): shes pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid shes pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// thog ma dang
265b5('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes pa'o// rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid shes
265b6('bum): pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi shes pa'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi shes pa'o// rdzu 'phrul
265b7('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi shes pa'o// dbang po lnga shes pa'o// stobs lnga shes pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun shes pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden bzhi shes pa'o// bsam gtan bzhi shes pa'o// tshad
265b8('bum): myed pa bzhi shes pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi shes pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad shes pa'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu shes pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa
266a1('bum): dang smond pa myed pa shes pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams shes pa'o// ting nge 'dzind rnams shes pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes pa'o// myi 'jigs pa bzhi shes pa
266a2('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad shes pa'o// byams pa chen po shes pa'o// snying rje chen po shes pa'o// dga' ba chen po shes pa'o// btang snyoms chen po shes pa'o// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang / 
266a3('bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes ma gtogs par/ de dag byang chub
266a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/ bag chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i thams cad
266a5('bum): spong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tsam ldan pa rab 'byar da kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
266a6('bum): to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems
266a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa
266a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag ci zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bye brag yod do// gsol pa/ bye brag ci lta bu zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa
266b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes pa rnyes pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la gnas shing chos thams cad la mun pa byed 'thob la/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems
266b2('bum): kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed do// rab 'byor de de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rtend pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa de la brten pas 'jig
266b3('bum): rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la sbyor zhing / thabs la mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa
266b4('bum): la bkod nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar la 'god pa yin no// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang thun mong
266b5('bum): pa ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
266b6('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu dang zil kyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang / nyon mongs pa myed pa/ 
266b7('bum): dang ngasmon lam gyi shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / yongs su dag pa bzhi dang / dbang bcu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i srung ba
266b8('bum): myed pa gsum dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyams pa myed pa'i chos nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa dang / thugs rje chen po dang / 
267a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byang bzang po brgya cu dang / gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo
267a2('bum): rnams te/ 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang gi lus dang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson
267a3('bum): 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bskul cing rnam par spyod do// lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing
267a4('bum): rnam par spyod do/ lus la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la myi gnas par rnam par spyod cing 'jig rtenang du gang yang nye bar lend par bya ba myed do// nang gyi tshor ba dang / phyi'i tshor ba dang / phyi
267a5('bum): nang gi tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang / ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bskuld cing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la zad
267a6('bum): pa'i rjes su lta zhing / rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la kun 'byung ba dang / zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la myi gnas par spyod cing / 'jig rtend du gang yang nye bar lend pa myed do// nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang
267a7('bum): phyi nang gi sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can/ shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bsald cing rnam par spyod do// sems la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su
267a8('bum): lta zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la myi gnas par rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len / 
267b1('bum): ba myed do// nang gyi chos dang phyi'i chos dang phyir tu mams kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bsald cing rnam par spyod do// chos la
267b2('bum): kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la myi gnas par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar lend pa myed
267b3('bum): do rab 'byor nga yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/ sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams myi bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa dang / skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir tshol ba dang / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed
267b4('bum): cing / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing shind tu rgyas pa'i phyir bya ba dang / sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa skyed pa'o// rab 'byor de rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin
267b5('bum): spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'a/ grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
267b6('bum): dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzind spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa 'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o// dbang po lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ 
267b7('bum): de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o// stobs lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs ste/ de dag ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub
267b8('bum): kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 
268a1('bum): shind tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzind yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o// rab 'byorang
268a2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsom pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran
268a3('bum): ba dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o// de la ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind to// stong pa nyid
268a4('bum): kyi ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang dben pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind ces bya'o// mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam pa
268a5('bum): sems rtse gcig pa ste/ 'di ni mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya'o// smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ myi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug/ bsngal gi rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni smond pa myed pa'i ting
268a6('bum): 'dzin ces bya'o// rnam pa tha rad pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa dang po'o// nang gzugs myed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/ phyi rol kyi gzugs rnams mthong ba dri ni rnam par
268a7('bum): thard pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa gsum pa'o// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa bzhi pa'o// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te
268a8('bum): gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa lnga'o// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thard pa drug pa'o// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa
268b1('bum): bdun pa'o// 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thard pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ces bya'o// mtha rang gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di la la la 'dod
268b2('bum): pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod/ 
268b3('bum): banye bar ni nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig du gyur pas rtog pa myed pa dung kya nas na las smyos pa'i dga' ba dang bde bdan la gan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran
268b4('bum): ba dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas shing / bde ba'i lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pas/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga'
268b5('bum): ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed/ sdug bsngal du ste dpa/ btang
268b6('bum): snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes ma yul sa gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes
268b7('bum): yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' yas
268b8('bum): so// zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes pa sa skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ 
269a1('bum): de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad byed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes byed 'du shes skyed phyi skye mched lce nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myod 'du shes
269a2('bum): myed myi nad skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ 'di ni mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o// de la mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu gang
269a3('bum): zhe na/ mtha' dag pa dang / mtha' dag chu dang / mtha' dag mye dang / mtha' dag rlung dang / mtha' dag sngon po dang / mtha' dag ser po dang / mtha' dag dmar po dang / mtha' dag dkar po dang / mtha' dag rnam par shes pa dang / mtha'
269a4('bum): dag nam mkha' ste/ de dag ni mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o// de la zild kyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/ nga gzugs su 'du shes shing phyi rold kyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug gu dang / 
269a5('bum): kha dog myi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zild kyis mnan te shes/ zil dkyis nan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil kyis gnond pa'i skye mched dang po'o// nang gzugs su 'du shes shing / 
269a6('bum): ma ci mas su 'ju ga sa me / 'dog sdug pa dang sa kyi sdug pa meng dang / gnag sa de dgapas kyis pan tems parang kyis mad te yong 'a des rdzogs pa de ni dri'i kyis gdo pa'i phyi mamed na
269a7('bum): pa'o// nang gzugs myed par 'du shes shing phyi rol kyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog myi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zild kyis nanan te shes zil kyis mnand te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de
269a8('bum): nani zi lid kyis gnod pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o// nang gzugs myed par 'du shes shing / phyi rold kyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog myi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te shes/ zil
269b1('bum): mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zild kyis gnond pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o// nang gzugs myed par 'du shes shing phyi rol kyi gzugs sngon po/ kha dog sngon po/ sngon por snang ba/ mdog sngon po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na
269b2('bum): me tog a ma kha lta bu lang/ yul bar na sor byas pa'i gos ltar sngo ba kha dog sngo ba/ sngo bar snang ba/ mdog sngo bar mthong yang / gzugs de dag zild kyis mnand te shes/ zild kyis mnand te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de
269b3('bum): ni zild kyis gnond pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o// nang gzugs myed par 'du shes shing phyi rol kyi gdu gas / so ser por snang ba mdog ser po 'di lta ste dper na// shig shegs pa'i me tog lta bu 'am/ yul ba ra na ser byas pa'i gos ltar
269b4('bum): ser ba kha dog ser ba ser bar snang ba/ mdog ser bar mthong yang ga zugs de dag zild kyis mnand te shes/ zil kyis mnand te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zilid kyis gnond pa'i skye mched drug pa'o// 
269b5('bum): nang gzugs myed par 'du shes shing phyi rold kyi gzugs dmar po kha dog dmar po dmar por snang ba mdog dmar po 'di lta ste dper na/ man du dzi pa ka'i me tog lta bu 'am/ yul ba ra na ser byas pa'i gos ltar
269b6('bum): dmar ba/ kha dog dmar ba dmar bar snang ba/ mdog dmar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te shes/ zild kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zi lid kyis gnond pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o// nang
269b7('bum): gzugs myed par 'du shes shing phyi rol kyi gzugs dkar po/ kha dog dkar po dkar por snang ba/ mdog dkar po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skar ma pa ba sangs kyi 'od lta bu 'am/ yul ba ra na ser byas pa'i gos ltar dkar ba kha dog
269b8('bum): dkar ba dkar bar snang ba/ mdog dkar bar mthong yang / gzugs de dag zi lad kyis mnan te shes/ bi lad kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zild kyis gnod pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o// de la nyon mongs pa myed
270a1('bum): pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa/ sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol kyi nyon mongs pa myi skye ba'i mthu yod pa dang / ting nge 'dzind gang
270a2('bum): gis bsgrub pa de ni nyon mongs pa myed pa zhes bya'o// smon lam gi shes pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas te 'di shes par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dus gsum gi shes pa 'am/ shes pa gang dang gang 'dod
270a3('bum): bar gyur pa de la yid kyis smond pa byed de/ de ting nge 'dzind de las langs nas de'i smond lam de yongs su sgrub par gyur cing / shes bya de yang shes pa de ni smond lam gi shes pa zhes bya'o// de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul
270a4('bum): gyi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i myig gi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i rna ba'i mdo na par shes pa dang / pha rol kyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang sngon gi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / zag pa zang
270a5('bum): pa'i mngon par shes pa ste drug po de dag go// de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe// na/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / dmyigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / ye shes yongs su dag pa ste/ bzhi po
270a6('bum): de dag go// de la dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / sems la dang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon dalam la dbang ba dang / rngu thul la dbang ba dang / 
270a7('bum): legs la dbang ba dang / chos la dadang ba dang 'acu po de dag go// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshe zhinas gang la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to
270a8('bum): gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang ma da ltar byung ba'i las yongs su grangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa gnas kyi rnam pa dang rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa'i
270b1('bum): lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyend to// khams sna tshogs can dang / khams du ma can gi 'jig rten gi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyend to// sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gi mos pa sna tshogs dang mos pa du ma yang
270b2('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyend to// sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gi dbang po rab dang tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyend to// kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyend to/
