270b3('bum): dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thard pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu/ 
270b4('bum): mkhyen to// rnam pa du ma sngon gi gnas rjes su dgongs te/ tshe rabs ga/ dacig kyang rjes su dgongs pa dang / tshe rabs brgya dang / tshe rabs stong dang / tshe rabs brgya stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar
270b5('bum): du yang rjes su dgongs so// skal pa gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/ skal ba brgya'i bar dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa ste/ nga phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma'i bar dag
270b6('bum): kyang rjes su dgongs te/ bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste// mying ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// rus ni 'di zhes bya sa gapa na tsu zas ni 'di za za'o// yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas gnas so// tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/ 
270b7('bum): bdag de nas shi bos te che ge mo zhig du skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du/ rnam pa dang bcas sa mal dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gi gnas rjes su dgongs so
270b8('bum): deltalha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pas sems can shi 'pho ba dang skye ba dag kyang gzigs so// kha dog sdug pa dang myi sdug pa dang bzang ba dang ngan pa dang / bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang / ngan song na 'khod pa dang / las ci lta ba bzhin du nye bar
271a1('bum): 'dong ba'i sems can rnam su rab tu mkhyend to// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa dag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la
271a2('bum): sku rad pa 'debs pa log par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyend kyis lus zhig nas/ ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba'i sems can dbul bar skye'o// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis
271a3('bum): legs par spyod pa dang ldad pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la skud pa myi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de'i sku de'i rkyend kyis lus zhig nas/ bde 'gro ma mo ras kyi 'jig rten lha'i ma
271a4('bum): du lce'i zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyedan to// zag pa rnams zang ba sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes pa rnam par grol ba zag pa byed pa yang dag pa jig pa pazhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ bcu po de dag ri ba'im
271a5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa 'i myi 'jigs pa bzhi gang ne na/ bdag gis yang dag par rtogs par sangs rgyas so zhes ngam bcas na/ de la chos 'di rnams mngon par
271a6('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes byabang dag la dge sbyong ba/ zab ze 'ab ste'abu 'jur brtsas pa ya/ spre krung tshogs gnan suyang rung ste/ 'jig rte na co man par 'gyur ro nas bya'i muyang dag par rjes sum mngo
271a7('bum): te/ rgyus dag pa zhes sum mas shi bag 'a mthotho pa dang / can ci byed mes pa dang / phyi rigs pa ba pa rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rnas pa de'i gnas su dam papa'o// 'khor ginang du seng ge'i sgrubastag so// 
271a8('bum): tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am gnan su yang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par skor bar myi nus pas bdag gis rab tu bskor 'byar// bdag zad pabazang de zhes dam bcas
271b1('bum): ni de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur
271b2('bum): re zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba myed pa thob pa dang / myi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ 
271b3('bum): 'khor gi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am gzhan su yang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar
271b4('bum): bya'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstand pa de dag la ba ste nad na/ bar chad kyi chos su myi 'gyur ro zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 
271b5('bum): 'jig rten na chos su mapa 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rje sa su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bdag tsha ba myed pa thob pa dang / myi 'jigs pa thob par
271b6('bum): rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs pa che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am gzhan su yang rung ste
271b7('bum): chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstand pa de dag la nan tan byas nas/ 
271b8('bum): sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar myi 'byung ngo zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos sa 'an sa golar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang
272a1('bum): dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba myed pa thob pa dang / myi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po'i gnas su dam bca'o// 
272a2('bum): 'khor gi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ 
272a3('bum): zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi po de dag ni myi 'jigs pa bzhi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang
272a4('bum): spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ don la dmyigs pa dang / chos la dmyigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la dmyigs pa dang / spobs pa la dmyigs pa'o// rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i srung ba myed pa gsum
272a5('bum): gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma da// myi mnga' bas la/ las shes su 'ong zhes gang bcab par rmongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la
272a6('bum): myi mnga' ste/ 'di ni srung ba myed pa dang po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa myi mngal bas la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang
272a7('bum): bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la myi mngar ste/ de ni srung ba myed pa gnyis pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs gzugs kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa myi mngar bas
272a8('bum): la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab par dgengs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyi ma nga ste/ de ni bsrung ba myed pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa na
272b1('bum): stond pa'i tshe/ la las rna ba btud de rim 'gror nyand cing bka' mnyand bI sems nye bar gzhog pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan byed na yang de de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par myi 'gyur/ yid byedade par myi 'gyur/ thugs yeng yeng / 
272b2('bum): por myi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'o// la la rna ba btud de rim 'gror nyand cing bka' mnyand pa'i sems nye bar gzhag pa myed pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du myi byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pI
272b3('bum): thugs khro bar myi 'gyur/ myi bzod par myi 'gyur/ thugs myi ches par myi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o// la la rna ba bdud te rim 'gror nyand cing bka' ba nyand pa'i sems nye bar gzhog la/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos
272b4('bum): la nan tan du byed/ la la rna ba btud de rim 'gror myi nyand cing bka' ba nyand pa'i sems nye bar 'jog pa myed de/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du myi byed kyang / des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa 'am/ thugs khro ba gnyis
272b5('bum): su myi 'gyur te/ thams cad du dgongs pa dang ldan zhing mkhyend par btang ste// mas su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o// / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyams pa myed pa'i chos gang zhe na/ gang gis
272b6('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos bstond pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus las myi 'da' ba ste/ de ni nyams pa myed pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spang
272b7('bum): ba gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni nyon mongs pa spangs kyang de dag la lus kyi 'gyur ba yod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de lta bu yang myi mnga' ste/ de ni bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa zhes bya'o// de la de bzhin
272b8('bum): gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gi brda' nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir dus thams cad du 'jig rten la nyin lan gsum/ mtshan lan
273a1('bum): gsum du rtog pa mdzad ces bya ste/ dngos su na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smind par bya ba la gzigs par rtag par 'byung ba ste/ de ni thugs rje chen po
273a2('bum): zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la khrul pa myi mnga'o// ca co mya mnga'o// rgongs pa nyams pa myi mnga'o// 'du shes sna tshogs myi mnga'o// thugs mnyam
273a3('bum): bar ma gzhag pa myi mnga'o// ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms myi mnga'o// mos pa yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o// brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o// dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o// ting nge 'dzind yongs su nyams
273a4('bum): pa myi mnga'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yod sa su nyams pa myi mnga'o// sku'i 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du
273a5('bum): 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // gsung gi 'phrin las tha/ mas cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // thu/ gas kyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes
273a6('bum): su 'brang ngo // 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzig sa pa'i 'jug go// ma 'ongs pa dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs
273a7('bum): pa 'jug go// de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la dmyigs pa myed pa dran pas dbang sgyur ba zhi ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid
273a8('bum): ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / zhabs shi nad tu gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs dra bar
273b1('bum): 'brel pa dang / phyag dang 'bas panon ning 'das pa dang / bdud shind tu mthong ba dang / sor me ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku tse zhing drang dang / zhabs legs par mtho ba dang / yan lag kyi spu kye nang du 'khyil pa dang / ri dgas
273b2('bum): e ne ya'i byind pa lta bu dang / phyag brgya drang por slebs pa dang / gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang / gser gi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa dang / s+phu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyand pa dang / 
273b3('bum): seng ge'i ri stod lta bu dang / 'phrag pa'i lhund mdzes par grub pa dang / phrag so shind tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang / shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang / ljags shi nad tu yangs pa dang / tshangs bI dbyangs
273b4('bum): dang / seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang / tshems shi nad tu dkar ba dang / tshems shi nad tu mnyam pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi pa cu tshang ba dang / spund dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de la de bzhin
273b5('bum): gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi 'thil la/ 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/ mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di lta ste/ rus pa 'am ba so la gzugs brkos pa dang 'a
273b6('bum): ba mnga' bas/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o// zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing zhabs zhum pa myed pas/ zhabs shi nad tu gnas pa'o// ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel da
273b7('bum): pas/ phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa'o// shing bal gyi ye bu ltar shi nad tu 'jam zhing gzhon pas/ phyag dang zhabs bzhon zhing 'jam pa'o// phyag dang zhabs dang 'gur gi lhun shind tu mtho bas bdun shi nang tu mtho ba'o// phyag dang zhabs
273b8('bum): gyi ser mo ring bas sor mo ring pa'o// ting pa ring bas rting pa yangs pa'o// sku 'phrag pa bdun tu 'phags la drang bas sku che zhing drang ba'o// pus mo'i lha dang long bu mdzes par nub pas zhabs legs par mtho ba'o// spu gyi nang du g.yas
274a1('bum): phyogs su 'khyil pas yan lag gyi spu gye nang du 'khyil ba'o// ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa dang / smig ma'am/ ldum du dard pa drang zhing ma nyams la rim gyis gzhol bar grub cing / byind pa zlum pas ri dgas e ne yo
274a2('bum): byind pa lta bu'o// brla drang por gzhag ste btud kyang phyag gi 'thil gnyis pus mo'i lha nga la reg pas/ phyag brla drang por slebs pa'o// glang po dang rta nang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shi nad tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas/ gsang
274a3('bum): ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa 'o// shind tu spangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gi kha dog go/ gser dang dngul shi nad tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i mdog tu 'dug la sku la rdul myi gos pas shind tu 'jam pa'o// 
274a4('bum): shind tu rnam par phye ba'i spu re rer skyes shing gnyis su myed pa'as s+phu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa'o// me tog kun da dang / zla ba dang 'o ma dang / ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la nyi ma dang zla ba rgya las kyang 'phags par 'od
274a5('bum): gsal ba'i mdzod spus/ smin mtshams shi nad tu rgya nad pas/ zhal/ mdzod spus brgyand pa'o// ro stod che bas seng ge'i ro stod do// mgur/ dang rgyud legs par 'breld cing ldan zlub pas phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub/ 
274a6('bum): pa'o gser gyi gtan pa shind tu phyis pa ltar phrag pa legs par grub pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'o// rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyis ma nyams shing / rnam par shes pa 'dre ba myed pas ro bri ba'i mchog go// sku chu zheng 'dom du mnyam
274a7('bum): bas shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa'o// spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas phyogs su 'khyild pa dang ldan pa'i dbu mnyam zhing legs par grub la mdzes pa mnga' bas/ dbu'i spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o// me tog ud pa la dmar po'i mdang / 
274a8('bum): ma'i kha dog ltar 'dug cing shind tu yangs pas ljags shi nad tu yangs shing srab pa'o// tshangs pa dang bya ka la bying ka lta bu'i gsung mngal bas// tshangs pa'i dbyangs so// 'gram pa mye long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mdzes
274b1('bum): par skyes te/ yid du 'ong bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o// me tog kun dang dung gyi bcag 'phro ltar sha nid tu dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas/ tshems shind tu dkar ba'o// tshems la mthon dman myed pas tshems mnyam pa'o// tshem la mtshams ma/ 
274b2('bum): dod pa tshems thags bzang ba'o// bla 'og ge gu myed pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o// dkar nag gi tshe ma 'dres pa la shind tu rnam par dag cing mdog dmar po gas khas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa'o// rdzi ma bla 'og shi nad tu legs
274b3('bum): khar gnas la 'dzings pas/ ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'o// do la bla mas bsu bskyal dang / chos nyan pa la sdod pa dang / gtsug lag ldang dang mchod rtedang rjes su bsgrub pa las bstsogs pa la bu rung byas pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i bcan dang / 
274b4('bum): ldan pa ste/ de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so// yi dam la brtan bas zhabs gning tu gnas te/ de ni myig yo 'ang gning tu brtan pa'is ltas so// sbyin pa dang ngag smasmad pa dang / dodan spyod pa dang / don mthun pa'i bsdu
274b5('bum): ba rnam pa bzhi goms par byas pas/ phyag dang zhabs drang bar 'brel ba ste/ de ni myu rad tu 'du ba'i lnga ltas so// bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / btung zhim ma zhing nyams su bde ba byind pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa/ 
274b6('bum): dang bdud shind tu mtho ba ste/ de gnyis ni bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba thob pa'i snga ltas so// bcings pa bkrol ba dang / srog gyi rim 'gro byas pa dang / srog gcod pa spangs pas/ sor mo ring ba dang rti
274b7('bum): pa yangs pa dang sku che zhing drung ba ste/ de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so// dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang / bzung ba mngon par spelang cing 'grib par ma byas pas/ zhabs kyi gong mthong ba 'am/ yan lag gi spu gye nad du 'khyilang
274b8('bum): pa ste/ de ni myi nyam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so// rig pa dang 'azo sa la gnas rim 'gror byas shing gzhan byin pa dang bdag gis blangs pas ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu ste/ de ni mu rang du 'dzind pa'i snga ltas so// bdog cing
275a1('bum): yod pa'i nor la bslangs nas/ myi 'gong bar gtong zhing myed ces ma byas pas/ phyag brgya drang por slebs pa ste/ de ni yo byad mnga' ba dang dul ba'i snga ltas so// 'grogs pa dang mdza' bshes dang gnyen ma bye ba dang / 
275a2('bum): bye bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par skul pa dang / gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrungs pas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste/ de ni bu mang ba'i snga ltas so// stand dang gos dang khang pa dang / gzhal
275a3('bum): myed khang dang / gnas bzang po byin pas/ gser gi kha dog dang mdog shind tu 'jam pa ste/ de gnyis ni bdan dang / na bza' dang khang pa dang gzhal myed khang dang gnas bzang po thob pa'i snga ltas so// 'du 'dzi spangs pa dang mkhan po dang slong
275a4('bum): dpon dang / pha ma dang phu nu las sotshogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim gro byas pa dang / btsun par byas pa dang / bcol da ba d+hU ba la ma gzan pas sU re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyild pa dang / zhal mdzod spus brgya nad
275a5('bum): pa ste/ de ni mnyam pa myed pa'i snga ltas so// myi snyand pa myi zer zhing myi smod la snyand par smra zhing legs par bshad pa mthun par 'dzin pas seng ge'i ro stod lta bu 'phrag pa'i ldan mdzes par grub pa ste/ de ni thub pa myed pa'i
275a6('bum): snga ltas so/ na ba rnams la rtsi dang rim 'gro dang / sman dang / nyams su phan ba 'i zas byind pa dang / rim 'gro byas pas phrag so shinang tu rgyas pa dang / rai bro ba'i mchog ste de ni nang nyung ba'i snga ltas so// bskyed mos tshal dang / 
275a7('bum): khor dang btung ba dang rdzing bu dang / rgal rka ba'i zam pa dang / kha zas dang 'phreng ba'i gnas dang / stegs dang gtsug lag khang bya ba las stsogs pa gzhan mos pas bya ba sngon du gtong zhing / bdag gis gzhan byind pas shing nya gro da lta bur chu
275a8('bum): zheng gab dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/ de ni mnga' ba chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas so// yun ring por tshig snyand cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde bar smras pas/ ljags shind tu yangs shing srab pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs te de gnyis
275b1('bum): ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung sa mnga' ba'i snga ltas so// gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ yongs su shes shing rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang / mnyand na dga' zhing myi mthun pa myed pa dang / zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba/ 
275b2('bum): dang / gtang myi bra zhing rnar snyand pa dang / ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o// yun ring po nas tshig khyal ba spangs shing dus dus su smra bas/ seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/ de ni tshig kun gyis mnyand pa'i snga ltas so// rim gror bya ba dang brnyas
275b3('bum): pa myed pa gnyis kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas/ tshems shi nad tu dkar ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de ni 'khor snga nas bstsags pa'i snga ltas so// yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma myed pa'i tshig smra bAs tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems// 
275b4('bum): mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ste/ de ni 'khor dbyer myi byed pa'i snga ltas so// dang gis khyud pa bzhin du nyes par bsam pa myed la ma chags myi sdang ba dang / da rmongs pa myed pa'i myig gis lta lta bas spyan dkar gnag 'byes pa dang / 
275b5('bum): ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so// rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe' byad bzang po brgya cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sangs
275b6('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/ sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen bshes byams pa dang / 'dra bar sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i thugs
275b7('bum): mnga' ba ste/ sen mo mdog snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs dang rgyud mthon por 'byung ba ste/ sen mo mtho ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul la kha na ma tho ba myi mnga' ba ste/ sor mo zlum pa
275b8('bum): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shind tu tshogs pa ste/ sor mo rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/ sor mo rim gis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas
276a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'phrin las dang 'tsho ba shi nad tu dben pa ste/ rtsa mya mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grel pa ste/ rtsa la mdud pa
276a2('bum): myed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dben pa'i chos mnga' ba ste/ long bu myi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni myi mnyam pa thams cad las grol ba ste/ zhabs myi mnyam pa myed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
276a3('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni myi'i seng ge ste/ seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni myi'i glang po ste/ glang po'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ngang ba'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud
276a4('bum): pa ste/ ngang ba'i stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mye'i khyu mchog ste/ khyu mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/ g.yas
276a5('bum): phyogs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta na mdzes/ pa ste/ mdzes par bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ ni rtag tu thugs yon po myi mnga' ba ste/ ma yo bar bzhud pa yin/ 
276a6('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshu/ la rnam par dag pa'i yon tan stond pe ste/ sku shind tu legs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos rnams shinang tu sbyangs pa ste/ sku shinang tu sbyangs pa yin/ sangs
276a7('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni chos rim gyis stond pa ste/ sku rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni sku dang gsung dang thugs gtsang ba dang ldan pa ste/ sku shind tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang
276a8('bum): bzhin gis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku shi nang tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
276b1('bum): ni chos dang 'dul ba shinang tu rdzogs pa ste/ dper byang shining tu rdzogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan yangs shing bzang ba stonang pa ste/ spu che zhing mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems
276b2('bum): can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku legs par mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mchog tu 'jam pa'i chos stond pa ste/ sku shinang tu gzhon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni rtag tu zhum pa
276b3('bum): myed pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku zhum pa myed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni myi dge ba'i rtsa ba byang ba ste/ sku shinang tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni yang 'byung ba shi nad tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/ sku shinang
276b4('bum): tu mkhregs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel da da par 'byung ba'i yan lag nga nyo pag sheg par stond pa ste/ yan lag dang nyid lag sba bar mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni gzigs
276b5('bum): pa shinang tu rnam par dag pa ste/ snang ba rab rib myed cing rnam par dag pa yi na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma ma/ ngar ba ste/ phyag zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
276b6('bum): ni 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad shind tu sbyangs pa ste/ phyal shind tu byang ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom pa ste/ phyal ma zhom pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni chos zad pa rnam par
276b7('bum): bzlog pa ste/ phyal phyam mer 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zab mo shi na tu thugs su chud pa ste/ lte ba zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mthun par 'dzind pa'i slob pa mnga' ba ste/ lte ba
276b8('bum): g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste/ kun nas mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shinang tu gtsang ba dang ldan pa ste/ 
277a1('bum): kun spyod pa shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nag po bstand pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste sku la sme ba myed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shing bal ltar
277a2('bum): yang ba rab tu thob pa chos stond pa ste/ phyag shing bal ltar shinang tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi skye bo dang skye bo phal la byams pas dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa ste/ phyag gi sor mo snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas/ 
277a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shinang tu zab cing brtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa'i chos yangs pa stond pa ste/ phyag gi ri mi ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
277a4('bum): ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang myi ring bar 'cha' ba ste/ zhal ha cang yang mya ra~M nga ba yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs brnyan 'jig rte/ na thams cad du bkye ba ste/ zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan lta snam yin/ sangs
277a5('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du gtong zhing 'dul ba ste/ ljags shind tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yaM na tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/ ljags shind tu srab pa yin/ sangs rgyas
277a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byis pa'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyis chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag par dka' ba ste/ ljags shining tu dmar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po'i sgra dang / 'brug gi sgra lta bus skems pa myi mnga' ba ste/ 
277a7('bum): glang po'i nga ro dang 'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyand cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ snyand cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
277a8('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni srid pa kun tu sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/ tshems mche ba shinang tu zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/ tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
277b1('bum): chos dang 'dul ba shi nad dkar ba ste/ tshems mche ba shind tu dkar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la zhugs pa ste/ mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis mngon par rtogs
277b2('bum): pa'i chos stond pa ste/ tshems mche ba rim gis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa ste/ shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i
277b3('bum): skye bo gtsang ba mnga' ba ste/ shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste/ spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par
277b4('bum): dag pa ste/ spyan shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi tshogs shinang tu bsngags pa ste/ rdzi ma sdug pa ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lha dang lha ma yin dang skyes bu dang na
277b5('bum): chung mchog tu dmyig dkar nag dbyes shing pad mo'i mdab ma ltar 'dug pa na mas kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba ste/ spyan dkar nag dbyes shing bad mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni rtag tu yangs pa/ 
277b6('bum): gzigs pa ste/ sbyin ma ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/ sbyin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyon thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ sprin pa'i spu ma nya
277b7('bum): ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa bI snum gis sems snum par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/ sprin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan
277b8('bum): ba mnga' ba ste/ stand legs shing snyan shal ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba ste/ snyand mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can bsam pa ma nyams pa 'dul
278a1('bum): ba ste/ snyan gi dbang po ma nyams pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/ zhal bral ba legs par grub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
278a2('bum): phas kyi rgol ba shind tu 'dul ba ste/ zhal bral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam dam pa shi nad tu rdzogs pa ste/ dbu shi nad tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi bung
278a3('bum): ba rnam par zlog pa ste/ dbu bung ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ba dang / bsgom pas spang ba'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/ dbu sdug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs
278a4('bum): 'jam pas bstand pa'i snying po thugs su chud pa ste/ dbu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/ dbu myi 'dzings pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
278a5('bum): brlang ba'i gsung dang yongs su bral ba ste dbu myi rtsub pa yin/ sangs rgya sa bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag spos gi me tog gis skye bo mthun par bsgrubs pa ste/ dbu dri zhim pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
278a6('bum): 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal gi bye bu dang / bkra shis dang dga' ba 'khyil pas brgya nad pa yin// rab 'byor de de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpe' byad bzang po brgyad bcu'o// rab
278a7('bum): 'byor de ltar de lta bu'i chos kyi rjes su rnam pa de dag gzhan la bshad pa dang / bstand pa dang yang dag par bstand pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
278a8('bum): sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so// 
278b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po bco brgyad pa'o// / 
278b2('bum): rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems
278b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can rnams sdud pa yin te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
278b4('bum): tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa drug gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyand par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe/ 
278b5('bum): na de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa myed do// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub se/ rnams dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshig snyand par smra bas sems can rnams
278b6('bum): srung ngo // rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dor bya bas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug po de dag gis dor bya/ 
278b7('bum): bas sems can rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa myed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos don bya bas sems can
278b8('bum): nams sdud do// rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug po dag gis
279a1('bum): don mthun pas sems can rnams srung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis chos thams cad ma 'dus pa byed de/ rab 'byorang de ltar ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dang
279a2('bum): mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
279a3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad du 'dems shing 'di skad stond te/ rigs kyi bu tshur sheg/ yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig pa la mkhas par gis
279a4('bum): shig/ yi ge gnyis nas yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas par gis shig/ yi ge gcig gis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gis shig/ yi ge gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gis shig/ 
279a5('bum): yi ge bzhi bcu na gnyis kyi bar gyi byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par ni sa shig/ yi ge gcig tu yigi bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par bsgoms shig/ la la yi ge bani bdun gnyis su mi ge gcig 'dus par bsgos
279a6('bum): shig ces ston to// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge ba ni bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgom
279a7('bum): pa la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par sgom pa la mkhas pa yin te/ de de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya na/ la la goms shing yi ge myed pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin
279a8('bum): no// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/ de chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pas ye ge ma
279b1('bum): bos yi ge byed pa'i chos ston kyang / rab 'byor da chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang bral ba yin te/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos te/ gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
279b2('bum): thams cad dang thun mong ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsoyod to// bcom ldan 'das gal te mtha' las 'das pa dang / theg pa dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ se thos
279b3('bum): can yang shin tu myi dmyigs chos kyang myi dmyigs/ chos kyi dngos po yang myi dmyigs pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol / 
279b4('bum): phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol bad tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi
279b5('bum): dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smond pa myed pa'i
279b6('bum): nge 'dzind la spyod pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po
279b7('bum): dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byad bzang po brgya cu la spyod cing / rnam par smind pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gnas nas/ sems
279b8('bum): can rnams la chos stond par 'gyur/ de la ni sems can myi dmyigs te/ sems can du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs so// sems can myi dmyigs pas gzugs dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas tshor ba dmyigs
280a1('bum): su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas 'du shes dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can gyi dmyigs pas 'du byed dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas rnam par shes pa dmyigs
280a2('bum): su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas myig dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas rna ba dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas sna dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas
280a3('bum): lce dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas lus dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas yid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas gzugs dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can
280a4('bum): myi dmyigs pas sgra dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas dri dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas pas ro dmyi gas su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas reg dmyigs su
280a5('bum): ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas chos dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas myig gi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
280a6('bum): dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas sna'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas lce'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas lus kyi tshe/ 
280a7('bum): par shes pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can dmyigs pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas myig gi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas rna ba'i
280a8('bum): 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pa lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas lus kyi
280b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems
280b2('bum): can myi dmyigs pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
280b3('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dmyigs su ma
280b4('bum): mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas sa'i khams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas chu'i khams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas mye'i khams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems
280b5('bum): can myi dmyigs pas rlung gi khams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems/ can myi dmyigs pas nam mkha'i khams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas rnam par shes pa'i khams dmyigs su
280b6('bum): ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas ma rig pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas 'du byed dmyigs su ma mchis so// so mas can myi dmyigs pas rnam par shes pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// 
280b7('bum): sems can myi dmyigs pas mying dang gzugs dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas skye mched drug dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas reg pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs
280b8('bum): pas tshor ba dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas sred pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas lend pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas srid pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// 
281a1('bum): sems can myi dmyigs pas skye ba dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas rga shi dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// 
281a2('bum): sems can myi dmyigs pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rold
281a3('bum): tu phyind pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi
281a4('bum): dmyigs pas nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can mying dmyigs pas phyi stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas phyi nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can
281a5('bum): myi dmyigs pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas chen po stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sem sa can myi dmyigs pas don dam pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so
281a6('bum): sems can myi dmyigs pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmyigs
281a7('bum): su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas rang bzhin
281a8('bum): stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can gyi
281b1('bum): dmyigs pasamyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su
281b2('bum): ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas
281b3('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas dbang po rnams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi
281b4('bum): dmyigs pas stobs rnams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmyigs su ma mchis so sems can myi dmyigs pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmyigs
281b5('bum): su ma mchis so// sems sbyin myi dmyigs pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rna mas dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas bsam pa/ tan rnams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ 
281b6('bum): tshang myed pa rnams dbyigs su ma mchis so// sems can dmyigs pas gzugs myed pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas rnam par thadad pa brgyad dmyigs su ma mchis
281b7('bum): song sems can myi dmyigs pas mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can gyi dmyigs pas stong ba nyid dang mtshan ma byed pa dang spodang pa byed pa dmyigs su ma mchis so/ sems can
281b8('bum): myi dmyigs pas mngon par shes pa rnams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas ting nge 'dzind rnams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmyigs su ma mchis so// 
282a1('bum): sems can myi dmyigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas myi 'jigs pa bzhi dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas so so yang dag par
282a2('bum): rig pa bzhi dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas byams pa chen po dbyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas snying rje chen po dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
282a3('bum): pa bcwo brgyad dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas
282a4('bum): byim gyi 'ong sde 'bras bu dkyi gsum ma chi so// seM can gyi dmyigs pa dgra bcom nyid dbyig su ma mchis so// sis cwa gyi dmyigs pA rang byang chub dbyig su ma mchi so// seMsi nA byir daphyogs yul gyi rnaM pa shes pa nyid dbyig su ma mchis// sos can gyi dbyigs pas rnaM pa thos cad mkhyend pa nyid dbyig sum mchi so// sos tsA gyi dmyigs
282a5('bum): kyi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems ca/ na myi dmyigs pas dpera' byang bzang po brgya bcu dmyigs su ma mchis so sems can dmyigs su ma mchis pa la ni sems can ma mchis so// gzugs
282a6('bum): ma mchis so// tshor ba ma mchis so// 'du shes ma mchis so// 'du byed ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// myig ma mchis so// rna ba 'am mchis so// sna ma mchis so// lce'u ma mchis so// lus ma mchis so// 
282a7('bum): yid ma mchis so// gzugs ma mchis so// sgra ma mchis so// dri ma mchis so// ro ma mchis so// reg ma mchis so// chos ma mchis so// myig gi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// sna'i rnam par
282a8('bum): shes pa ma mchis so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus
282b1('bum): te reg pa ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// myig gi 'dus pa te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
282b2('bum): bam mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma
282b3('bum): mchis so// sa'i khams ma mchis so// chu'i khams ma mchis so// mye'i khams ma mchis so// rlung gi khams ma mchis so// nam mkha'i khams ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis so// ma rig pa ma mchis so// 
282b4('bum): 'du byed ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// mying dang gzugs ma mchis so// skye mched drug ma mchis so// reg pa ma mchis so// tshor ba ma mchis so// sred pa ma mchis so// lend pa ma mchis so// srid pa ma
282b5('bum): mchis so// skye ba ma mchis so// rga shi ma mchis so// sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma mchis so/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
282b6('bum): tu phyind pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma mchis so// nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so// phyi stong pa nyid ma mchis so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so// stong pa nyid stong
282b7('bum): pa nyid ma mchis so// chen po stong pa nyid ma mchis so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// thog ma dang
282b8('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma mchis so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma mchis so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma mchis
283a1('bum): so dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis so// yang dag par spong ba rnams
283a2('bum): ma mchis so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma mchis so// nga tsun pa rnam mamatshan nas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma mchis so// 
283a3('bum): bsam gtan rnams ma mchis so// tshad myed pa rnams ma mchis so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma mchis so// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad pa ma mchis so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma mchis
283a4('bum): so stong pa nyid ma mchis so// mtshan ma myed pa ma mchis so// smond pa myed pa ma mchis so// mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so// ting nge 'dzin rnams ma mchis so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs
283a5('bum): pa'i stobs bcu ma mchis so/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi ma mchis so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma mchis so// byams pa chen po ma mchis so// snying rje chen po ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad/ 
283a6('bum): ma mchis so// rgyund tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// land ci ga phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchi sa so// dgra bcom pa nyid ma mchis so// rang byang chub ma mchis so// 
283a7('bum): lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma mchis so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma mchis so// myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis ma mchis so// dpe' byad bzang po brgya cu ma mchis so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de
283a8('bum): ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ga la
283b1('bum): mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da ba/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// rab 'byor de ltar sems can gyi dmyigs pas/ nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// phyi stong pa nyid
283b2('bum): du rig par bya'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'dus ma byas
283b3('bum): stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// chos thams
283b4('bum): cad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du rig pa dar bya'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dngos po myed pa ste/ dang pa nyid du rig par bya'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dngos
283b5('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// phung po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// khams stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// skye mched stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid du rig par
283b6('bum): bya'o// bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sems can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// srog stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'gro ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// gso' ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// skyes
283b7('bum): bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// gang zag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// shed can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// shed bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byed pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byed du 'jug pa po stong pa nyid du rig par/ 
283b8('bum): bya'o// slong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// kun nas slong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// tshor po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// tshor bar byed po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// shes pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// mthong
284a1('bum): pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dbang po stong pa nyid du rig
284a2('bum): par bya'o// stobs stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid du rig pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// bsam gtan stong
284a3('bum): pa nyid du rig par bya'o// tshad myed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rnam par thard pa brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
284a4('bum): pa dgu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa byed stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// myi 'jigs pa bzhi stong pa
284a5('bum): nyid du rig par bya'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byams pa chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// snying rje chen po stong pa nyid/ du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad stong
284a6('bum): pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dgra bcom pa nyid stong
284a7('bum): pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rang byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend/ na byu nyid shi par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas
284a8('bum): stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor da de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad stong par
284b1('bum): mthong nas/ phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos stond to// de ci ltar stong pa nyid de dag la yang myi 'jug pa de ltar ston te/ des de ltar mthong nas/ chos thams cad ni sgrib pa myed par shes te/ chos gang yang
284b2('bum): 'khrug par myi byed do// gnyis su myi byed do// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang ston pa myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa bye ba phrag du ma sprul cing / sems can la la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
284b3('bum): pa la sbyor ka/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyor/ la la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyor/ la la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyor/ la la bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyor/ la la shes rab kyi pha
284b4('bum): rol tu phyind pa la sbyor/ la la bsam gtan bzhi la sbyor/ la la tshad byed// de bzhi la sbyor/ la la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi lo sbyor/ la la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la yang
284b5('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi la sbyor/ la la rdzu 'phrul gi rkang po bzhi la sbyor/ la la dbang po lnga la spyod/ la la stobs lnga la sbyor/ la la byang chub kyi ya na lag bdun la sbyor/ la la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
284b6('bum): pas spyod/ ma la 'dags pa'i do papanis byung/ lasadam pa sa brgyad bsnod/ pams pa sa gnas pa'i mims par 'dus pa gyu gyur/ sarnam pa du'i na rang nyid dang / nga bres
284b7('bum): smod pa myed pa la sbyor/ la la mngon par shes pa lnga la spyod/ la la ting nge 'dzind rnams sbyor/ lal gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sbyor/ la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyor/ lal myi 'jigs pa bzhi la sbyor/ 
284b8('bum): la la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la byams pa chen po la sbyor/ la la snying rje chen po la sbyor/ la la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor/ la la rgyund tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor/ la lo la
285a1('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor/ la la phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor/ lA la dgra bcom pa nyid la sbyor/ la la rang byang chub la sbyor/ la la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la sbyor/ la la rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa
285a2('bum): ba nyid la sbyoran// rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ sprul pa des chos la la zhig tha dad du phye ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub
285a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa' la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de dag phyind ci log rnams las yongs su bkrol nas bcings ma grol ba'i tshul du yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du ra
285a4('bum): tu 'god do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ma bcings ma 'grol ba/ tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'du shes ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba// myig ma
285a5('bum): bcings ma grol ba/ rna ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ sna ma bcings ma grol ba/ lce ma bcings ma grol ba/ lus ma bcings ma grol ba/ yid ma ba/ cings ma grol ba/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/ sgra ma bcings ma grol
285a6('bum): ba dri ma bcings ma grol ba/ rom bcings ma grol ba/ reg ma bcings ma grol ba chos ma bcings ma grol ba/ myig gi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ma
285a7('bum): bcings ma grol ba/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma
285a8('bum): bcings pa grol ba/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
285b1('bum): kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ lus
285b2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma bcings pa grol ba// sa'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ chu'i khams pa bcings ma grol ba/ mye'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ 
285b3('bum): rlung gi khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ nam mkha'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba// ma rig pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba// / 
285b4('bum): mying dang gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/ skye mched drug ma bcings ma grol ba reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ sred pa ma bcings pa grol ba/ lend pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ srid pa ma bcings ma
285b5('bum): grol ba/ skye ba ma bcings ma grol ba// rga shi ma bcings ma grol ba// spyi/ na ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshul khrims kyi pha/ rol tu phyind pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma
285b6('bum): bcings ma grol ba brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ba cings ma grol ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bcings ma grol ba// nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ phyi steng
285b7('bum): pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ chen po stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma bcings
285b8('bum): ma grol ba/ 'dus ma byas pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ rang
286a1('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid mi bcings ma grol ba/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ 
286a2('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol po// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ yang dag
286a3('bum): par spong ba rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma bcings ma grol/ dbang po rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ stobs rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ 
286a4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ bsam gtan rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshad myed pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
286a5('bum): par 'jug pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams ma ba/ cings ma grol ba/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
286a6('bum): ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba// ting nge 'dzind rnams ma bcings ma gro la ba/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ de bzhin
286a7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma bcings ma grol ba/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi ma bcings ma grol ba/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma bcings ma grol ba/ byams pa chen po ma bcings ma grol ba/ snying rje chen po ma bcings ma grol ba
286a8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma bcings ma grol ba/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma bcings ma grol ba/ land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma bcings ma grol ba/ byir myong ba'i 'bras bu ma bcings ma grol ba/ dgra yong
286b1('bum): khacings ma grol ba/ rang byang chub bcings ma grol ba/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa/ 
286b2('bum): de ni/ gzugs ma yin no// tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin no// 'du shes kyi ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin pa de ni 'du shes ma yin no// 'du byed kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang
286b3('bum): yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// myig gi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ni myig ma yin no// rna ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid
286b4('bum): gang yin bden pa ma yin no// snga'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sna ma yin no// lce'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lde ma yi na no// lus kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus ma yin
286b5('bum): no yid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid ma yin no// gzu/ gas kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no// sgra'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sgra ma yin no// dri'i
286b6('bum): ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dri ma yin no// ro ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ro ma yin no// reg gi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de reg ma yin no// chos kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de chos ma
286b7('bum): yin no// byig gi rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnamu par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// sna'i rnam pa/ 
286b8('bum): shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes dra'i ma bcings ma
287a1('bum): grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol
287a2('bum): ba nyid gang yin pa de myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg
287a3('bum): pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
287a4('bum): ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin da ba de myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te/ 
287a5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba'i// 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te
287a6('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba' ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma bcings
287a7('bum): ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// sa'i khams/ 
287a8('bum): kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sa'i khams ma yin no// chu'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de chu'i khams ma yin no// mye'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mye'i khams ma yin no// rlung gi
287b1('bum): khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rlung gi khams ma yin no// nam mkha'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de nam mkha'i khams ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa
287b2('bum): de rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no// ma rig pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ma rig pa ma yin no// 'du byed kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gangs
287b3('bum): yin no// mying dang gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mying dang gzugs ma yin no// skye mched drug gi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de skye mched drug ma yin no// reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de reg pa ma
287b4('bum): yin no// tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no/ sred pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sred pa ma yin no// le nad pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de le nad pa ma yin no// srid pa'i ma bcings
287b5('bum): ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de srid pa ma yin no// skye ba'i ma bcings ma gre la ba nyid gang yin pa de skye ba ma yin no// rga' shi'i ma bcings ma grol ba da nyid gang yin pa de rga shi ma yin no// sbyir ba'i pha rol tu byind pa'i ma
287b6('bum): bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yi na pa de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol pa
287b7('bum): tu phyind pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// bsam gtan
287b8('bum): gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// 
288a1('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang / 
288a2('bum): yin pa de phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no// don dam pa
288a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang
288a4('bum): yin pa de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ no// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa
288a5('bum): de thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi/ ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rang bzhin
288a6('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid sto nga pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
288a7('bum): ma yin no// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
288a8('bum): kyim bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
288b1('bum): kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma bcings
288b2('bum): ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no// dbang po rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dbang po rnams ma yin no// stobs rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de stobs rnams ma yin no// 
288b3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin no// 
288b4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'ab gas pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams kyi ma bcing sa ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de bsam gtan rnams ma yin no// tshad myed pa
288b5('bum): rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshad myed pa rnams ma yin/ ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma
288b6('bum): yin no// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ma yin no// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
288b7('bum): pa dgu ma yin no// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams
288b8('bum): kyis bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no// ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pade/ 
289a1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
289a2('bum): ma yin no// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de myi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no// byams
289a3('bum): pa chen po'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de byams pa chen po ma yin no// snying rje chen po'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de snying rje chen po ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang
289a4('bum): yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ma yin no/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no/ land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang
289a5('bum): yin pa de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dgra
289a6('bum): bcom pa nyid ma yin no// rang byang chub kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yi na pa de rang byang chub ma yin no// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
289a7('bum): pa'i byang chub ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// tshor ba ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'du shes ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'du byed ni shind tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni shin
289a8('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'o// myig ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rna ba ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// sAr ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// lcel ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// lus ni shin tu rnam zer dag pa'o// ming ni shin tu rnam par/ 
289b1('bum): dag pa'o gzugs ni shinang du rnam par dag pa'o// sgra ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// drin shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// ron shining tu rnam par shes pa'o// reg ni gning tu rnam par dag pa'o// chos ni gning tu rnam par dag pa'o// 
289b2('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa ni shind tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'i rnam par shes pa ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa ni shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// lus kyi rnam
289b3('bum): par shes pa ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ 
289b4('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni sha nang tu rnam par dag pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg
289b5('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tum par dag pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg ba las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sha ning tu rnam par dag pa'o// lce'i 'dus
289b6('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te rog pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// sa'i khams ni shin tu/ 
289b7('bum): rnam par dag pa'o// chu'i khams ni gnang tu rnam par dag pa'o// mye'i khams ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// rlung gi khams ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// nam mkha'i khams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams ni
289b8('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// ma rig pa ni shind tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'du byed ni shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'o// mying dang gzugs ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// skye mched drug ni shinang
290a1('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'o// reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// tshor ba ni shind tu rnam par dag pa'o// sred pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lend pa ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// srid pa ni shinang tu rnam par dag
290a2('bum): pa'o/ skye ba ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// rga shi ni shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni shind tu rnam par dag pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shi ning tu rnam par dag pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
290a3('bum): pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rild tu phyind pa ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ 
290a4('bum): nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid ni shin tu
290a5('bum): rnam par dag pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'dus ma byas ston/ kha nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni
290a6('bum): shinin tu rnam par dag pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni shin tu rma
290a7('bum): par dag pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shinang tu rnam par dag
290a8('bum): pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rka
290b1('bum): ba rnams ni shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'o/ dbang po rnams ni shind tu rnam par dag pa'o// stobs rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
290b2('bum): ba ni shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// bsam gtan rnams ni shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'o// tshad myed pa rnams ni shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par/ 
290b3('bum): 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed
290b4('bum): ba dang smon pa byed gshin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni shin tu rnam pa ru dag pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni shining tu rnam par dag pa'o// de ni/ 
290b5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// byams pa chen po ni shin tu rnam par dag de
290b6('bum): snying rje chen po ni gning tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shining tu rnam pa
290b7('bum): dag pa'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rang byang chub ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni shinang tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam pa thams
290b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston kyang / sems can tu myi dmyigs/ 
291a1('bum): so byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad myi dmyigs pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis gnas te/ gzugs stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang
291a2('bum): 'du shes stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / myig stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / snga
291a3('bum): stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lce'u stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lus stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yid stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang // gzugs stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sgra stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i
